table_lines.comment: Relative importance of satisfying constraint, where high values represent more important constraints.

table_lines.name: >Delivery Warning Dose
table_lines.comment: The dose (in Gy) that when reached or exceeded should cause some action to be taken.

table_lines.name: >Delivery Maximum Dose
table_lines.comment: The maximum dose (in Gy) that can be delivered to the dose reference.

table_lines.name: >Target Minimum Dose
table_lines.comment: Minimum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is TARGET.

table_lines.name: >Target Prescription Dose
table_lines.comment: Prescribed dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is TARGET.

table_lines.name: >Target Maximum Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is TARGET.

table_lines.name: >Organ at Risk Full-volume Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum dose (in Gy) to entire Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >Organ at Risk Limit Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to any part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >Organ at Risk Maximum Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum dose (in Gy) to non-overdosed part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >Organ at Risk Overdose Volume Fraction
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted fraction (in percent) of the Organ at Risk to receive more than the Organ at Risk Maximum Dose if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: Tolerance Table Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of tolerance tables to be used for delivery of treatment plan.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Tolerance Table Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Tolerance Table. The value of Tolerance Table Number (300A,0042) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Tolerance Table Label
table_lines.comment: User-defined label for Tolerance Table.

table_lines.name: >Gantry Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Gantry Angle.

table_lines.name: >Gantry Pitch Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Gantry Pitch Angle.

table_lines.name: >Beam Limiting Device Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Beam Limiting Device Angle.

table_lines.name: >Beam Limiting Device Tolerance Sequence
table_lines.comment: Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) tolerances. One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered leaf (element) or jaw positions for current beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >Patient Support Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Patient Support Angle.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Eccentric Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Table Top Eccentric Angle.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Pitch Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between the planned and delivered Table Top Pitch Angle.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Roll Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between the planned and delivered Table Top Roll Angle.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Vertical Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Vertical Position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Longitudinal Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Longitudinal Position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Lateral Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Lateral Position.

table_lines.name: Patient Setup Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of patient setup data for current plan.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Patient Setup Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Patient Setup. The value of Patient Setup Number (300A,0182) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Patient Setup Label
table_lines.comment: The user-defined label for the Patient Setup.

table_lines.name: >Patient Additional Position
table_lines.comment: User-defined additional description of patient position. Required if Patient Position (0018,5100) is not present.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Setup Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of setup verification images for this patient setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >>Setup Image Comment
table_lines.comment: Comment on the Setup Image.

table_lines.name: >Fixation Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Fixation Devices used in Patient Setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Fixation Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Fixation Device used during in Patient Setup.

table_lines.name: >>Fixation Device Label
table_lines.comment: User-defined label identifier for Fixation Device.

table_lines.name: >>Fixation Device Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Fixation Device.

table_lines.name: >>Fixation Device Position
table_lines.comment: Position/Notch number of Fixation Device.

table_lines.name: >>Fixation Device Pitch Angle
table_lines.comment: The Fixation Device Pitch Angle, i.e., orientation of PITCHED FIXATION DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC PATIENT SUPPORT coordinate system (degrees). Pitching is the rotation around IEC PATIENT SUPPORT X-axis.

table_lines.name: >>Fixation Device Roll Angle
table_lines.comment: The Fixation Device Roll Angle, i.e., orientation of ROLLED FIXATION DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC PITCHED FIXATION DEVICE coordinate system (degrees). Rolling is the rotation around IEC PATIENT SUPPORT Y-axis.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >Shielding Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Shielding Devices used in Patient Setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Shielding Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Shielding Device used in Patient Setup.

table_lines.name: >>Shielding Device Label
table_lines.comment: User-defined label for Shielding Device.

table_lines.name: >>Shielding Device Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Shielding Device.

table_lines.name: >>Shielding Device Position
table_lines.comment: Position/Notch number of Shielding Device.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >Setup Technique
table_lines.comment: Setup Technique used in Patient Setup.

table_lines.name: >Setup Technique Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Setup Technique.

table_lines.name: >Setup Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of devices used for patient alignment in Patient Setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Setup Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Setup Device used for patient alignment.

table_lines.name: >>Setup Device Label
table_lines.comment: User-defined label for Setup Device used for patient alignment.

table_lines.name: >>Setup Device Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for Setup Device used for patient alignment.

table_lines.name: >>Setup Device Parameter
table_lines.comment: Units shall be mm for distances and degrees for angles.

table_lines.name: >>Setup Reference Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Setup Reference used for patient alignment.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Vertical Setup Displacement
table_lines.comment: Vertical Displacement in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (in mm) relative to initial Setup Position, i.e., vertical offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Longitudinal Setup Displacement
table_lines.comment: Longitudinal Displacement in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (in mm) relative to initial Setup Position, i.e., longitudinal offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Lateral Setup Displacement
table_lines.comment: Lateral Displacement in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (in mm) relative to initial Setup Position, i.e., lateral offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

table_lines.name: >Motion Synchronization Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Motion Synchronization.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Respiratory Motion Compensation Technique
table_lines.comment: Technique applied to reduce respiratory motion artifacts.

table_lines.name: >>Respiratory Signal Source
table_lines.comment: Signal source from which respiratory motion is derived.

table_lines.name: >>Respiratory Motion Compensation Technique Description
table_lines.comment: Description of respiratory motion compensation technique.

table_lines.name: >>Respiratory Signal Source ID
table_lines.comment: Identifies the device providing the respiratory signal.

table_lines.name: Fraction Group Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Fraction Groups in current Fraction Scheme.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Fraction Group Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Fraction Group. The value of Fraction Group Number (300A,0071) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Fraction Group Description
table_lines.comment: The user defined description for the fraction group.

table_lines.name: >Definition Source Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Instances containing the source of the Fraction Group information.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.
Permitted Referenced SOP Class is RT Radiation Set ("1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.481.12").
See

table_lines.name: >Referenced Dose Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Related Instances of RT Dose (for grids, isodose curves and named/unnamed point doses).
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Dose References for the current Fraction Group.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Constraint Weight
table_lines.comment: Relative importance of satisfying constraint, where high values represent more important constraints.

table_lines.name: >>Delivery Warning Dose
table_lines.comment: The dose (in Gy) that when reached or exceeded should cause some action to be taken.

table_lines.name: >>Delivery Maximum Dose
table_lines.comment: The maximum dose (in Gy) that can be delivered to the dose reference.

table_lines.name: >>Target Minimum Dose
table_lines.comment: Minimum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET.

table_lines.name: >>Target Prescription Dose
table_lines.comment: Prescribed dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET.

table_lines.name: >>Target Maximum Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET.

table_lines.name: >>Target Underdose Volume Fraction
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted fraction (in percent) of Target to receive less than the Target Prescription Dose (300A,0027) if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >>Organ at Risk Full-volume Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum dose (in Gy) to entire Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >>Organ at Risk Limit Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to any part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >>Organ at Risk Maximum Dose
table_lines.comment: Maximum dose (in Gy) to non-overdosed part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >>Organ at Risk Overdose Volume Fraction
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted fraction (in percent) of Organ at Risk to receive more than the Organ at Risk Maximum Dose if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

table_lines.name: >Number of Fractions Planned
table_lines.comment: Total number of treatments (Fractions) prescribed for current Fraction Group.

table_lines.name: >Number of Fraction Pattern Digits Per Day
>Beam Dose Meaning
table_lines.comment: Indicates the meaning of Beam Dose (300A,0084).

table_lines.name: >Number of Beams
table_lines.comment: Number of Beams in current Fraction Group. If Number of Beams is greater then zero, Number of Brachy Application Setups (300A,00A0) shall equal zero.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Beam Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment beams in current Fraction Group.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required if Number of Beams (300A,0080) is greater than zero.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference UID
table_lines.comment: If present shall have a value that is present in the Dose Reference Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Dose
table_lines.comment:
Dose (in Gy) due to current Beam for one treatment fraction.
See Note

table_lines.name: >>Beam Dose Type
table_lines.comment:
Type of Dose of the Beam Dose (300A,0084).
Shall not have the same value as Alternate Beam Dose Type (300A,0092).
Required if Alternate Beam Dose (300A,0091) is present. May be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >>Alternate Beam Dose
table_lines.comment:
Alternate Dose (in Gy) according to the Alternate Beam Dose Type (300A,0092).
See Note

table_lines.name: >>Alternate Beam Dose Type
table_lines.comment:
Type of Dose of the Alternate Beam Dose (300A,0091).
Shall not have the same value as Beam Dose Type (300A,0090).
Required if Alternate Beam Dose (300A,0091) is present.

table_lines.name: >>Dose Calibration Conditions Verified Flag
table_lines.comment: Indicates whether verifiable calibration conditions of the delivery device were used during treatment planning.

table_lines.name: >>Dose Calibration Conditions Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Dose calibration conditions for the referenced beam.
Required if Dose Calibration Conditions Verified Flag (300C,0123) is present and equals YES and Radiation Device Configuration and Commissioning Key Sequence (300A,065A) is absent.
May be present if Radiation Device Configuration and Commissioning Key Sequence (300A,065A) is present.
Only a single Item shall be present in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Absorbed Dose to Meterset Ratio
table_lines.comment: Ratio of absorbed dose in Gy to Meterset as defined by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3) in the reference conditions.

table_lines.name: >>>Delineated Radiation Field Size
table_lines.comment: Field size in mm in X and Y directions in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system, specified by a numeric pair, X value then Y value.

table_lines.name: >>>Calibration Reference Point Depth
table_lines.comment: Calibration reference point depth in mm from the phantom surface.

table_lines.name: >>>Source to Surface Distance
table_lines.comment: Distance in mm from the radiation source to the phantom surface during calibration.

table_lines.name: >>>Calibration DateTime
table_lines.comment: Date and time the calibration was performed.

table_lines.name: >>Radiation Device Configuration and Commissioning Key Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Keys identifying the configuration and commissioning data used as input for treatment planning of this Instance.
Value Type (0040,A040) is constrained to value UIDREF.
Required if Dose Calibration Conditions Verified Flag (300C,0123) is present and equals YES and Dose Calibration Conditions Sequence (300C,0120) is absent.
May be present if Dose Calibration Conditions Sequence (300C,0120) is present.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Number of Brachy Application Setups
table_lines.comment: Number of Brachy Application Setups in current Fraction Group. If Number of Brachy Application Setups is greater then zero, Number of Beams (300A,0080) shall equal zero.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Brachy Application Setup Sequence
table_lines.comment: Sequence of treatment Brachy Application Setups in current Fraction Group. Required if Number of Brachy Application Setups (300A,00A0) is greater than zero. One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Application Setup Dose
table_lines.comment: Dose (in Gy) at Brachy Application Setup Dose Specification Point (300A,00A2) due to current Brachy Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference UID
table_lines.comment: If present, shall have a value that is present in the Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010).

table_lines.name: Beam Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment beams for current RT Plan.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Definition Source Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Instances containing the source of the Beam information.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >Radiation Type
table_lines.comment: Particle type of Beam.

table_lines.name: >Primary Fluence Mode Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence defining whether the primary fluence of the treatment beam uses a non-standard fluence-shaping.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Fluence Mode
table_lines.comment: Describes whether the fluence shaping is the standard mode for the beam or an alternate.

table_lines.name: >>Fluence Mode ID
table_lines.comment:
Identifier for the specific fluence-shaping mode.
Required if Fluence Mode (3002,0051) has value NON_STANDARD.

table_lines.name: >High-Dose Technique Type
table_lines.comment:
Type of high-dose treatment technique.
Required if treatment technique requires a dose that would normally require overriding of treatment machine safety controls.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Machine Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name identifying treatment machine to be used for beam delivery. See Note 2.

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of the equipment to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Name
table_lines.comment: Institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Address
table_lines.comment: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Name
table_lines.comment: Department in the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Type Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A coded description of the type of Department or Service within the healthcare facility.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer's Model Name
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Device Serial Number
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Date of Manufacture
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery was originally manufactured or re-manufactured (as opposed to refurbished).

table_lines.name: >Date of Installation
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery was installed in its current location. The equipment may or may not have been used prior to installation in its current location.

table_lines.name: >Primary Dosimeter Unit
table_lines.comment:
Measurement unit of machine dosimeter.
See

table_lines.name: >Source-Axis Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to Gantry rotation axis distance of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery (mm).

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag
table_lines.comment: Whether the RT Beam Limiting Devices are specified by the Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1).

table_lines.name: >Beam Limiting Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) sets.
Required if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is absent, or is present and has the value NO.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >>Source to Beam Limiting Device Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to beam limiting device (collimator) distance of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs
table_lines.comment: Number of leaf (element) or jaw pairs (equal to 1 for standard beam limiting device jaws).

table_lines.name: >>Leaf Position Boundaries
table_lines.comment: Boundaries of beam limiting device (collimator) leaves (in mm) in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate axis appropriate to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8), i.e., X-axis for MLCY, Y-axis for MLCX. Contains N+1 values, where N is the Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs (300A,00BC), starting from Leaf (Element) Pair 1. Required if RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8) is MLCX or MLCY. May be present otherwise. See Note 3.

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Descriptions.
Required if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.usage:
Device Type Code Sequence (3010,002E) within

See

table_lines.name: >Referenced Reference Image Sequence
table_lines.comment: Reference images used for validation of current beam. One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Reference Image Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Reference Image within Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300C,0042).

table_lines.name: >>Start Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition starts.

table_lines.name: >>End Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition ends.

table_lines.name: >Planned Verification Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of planned verification images to be acquired during current beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >>Start Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition will start.

table_lines.name: >>Meterset Exposure
table_lines.comment: Meterset duration over which image is to be acquired, specified in Monitor units (MU) or minutes as defined by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3).

table_lines.name: >>End Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition will end.

table_lines.name: >>RT Image Plane
table_lines.comment: Describes whether or not image plane is normal to beam axis.

table_lines.name: >>RT Image Orientation
table_lines.comment: The direction cosines of the first row and the first column with respect to the IEC X-RAY IMAGE RECEPTOR coordinate system.

table_lines.name: >>RT Image Position
table_lines.comment: The x and y coordinates (in mm) of the upper left hand corner of the image, in the IEC X-RAY IMAGE RECEPTOR coordinate system. This is the center of the first pixel transmitted.

table_lines.name: >>RT Image SID
table_lines.comment: Radiation machine source to image plane distance (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Imaging Device-Specific Acquisition Parameters
table_lines.comment: User-specified device-specific parameters that describe how the imager will acquire the image.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Reference Image Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Reference Image to which planned verification image is related, specified by Reference Image Number (300A,00C8) within Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300C,0042).

table_lines.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
table_lines.comment: Delivery Type of treatment.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Dose Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Related Instances of RT Dose (for grids, isodose curves, and named/unnamed point doses).
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Number of Wedges
table_lines.comment: Number of wedges associated with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Wedge Sequence
table_lines.comment: Sequence of treatment wedges. Required if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero. One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Wedge. The value of Wedge Number (300A,00D2) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Type
table_lines.comment: Type of wedge (if any) defined for Beam.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for Wedge.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Angle
table_lines.comment: Nominal wedge angle (degrees).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Factor
table_lines.comment: Nominal wedge factor under machine calibration conditions at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Orientation
table_lines.comment: Orientation of wedge, i.e., orientation of IEC WEDGE FILTER coordinate system with respect to IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (degrees).

table_lines.name: >>Source to Wedge Tray Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to wedge tray attachment edge distance (in mm) for current wedge.

table_lines.name: >Number of Compensators
table_lines.comment: Number of compensators associated with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Total Compensator Tray Factor
table_lines.comment: Compensator Tray transmission factor (between 0 and 1), at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111).

table_lines.name: >Compensator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment compensators.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Description
table_lines.comment: User defined description for the compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Compensator. The value of Compensator Number (300A,00E4) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created. Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of compensator (if any).

table_lines.name: >>Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for material used to manufacture Compensator. Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Compensator intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Tray ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for compensator tray.

table_lines.name: >>Tray Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Tray intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Source to Compensator Tray Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to compensator tray attachment edge distance (in mm) for current compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Divergence
table_lines.comment: Indicates presence or absence of geometrical divergence of the compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Mounting Position
table_lines.comment: Indicates on which side of the Compensator Tray the compensator is mounted.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Rows
table_lines.comment: Number of rows in the compensator. A row is defined to be in the X direction of the IEC Beam Limiting Device Coordinate system.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Columns
table_lines.comment: Number of columns in the compensator. A column is defined to be in the Y direction of the IEC Beam Limiting Device Coordinate system.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Position
table_lines.comment: The x and y coordinates of the upper left hand corner (first pixel transmitted) of the compensator, projected onto the machine isocentric plane in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (mm).

table_lines.name: >Number of Boli
table_lines.comment: Number of boli associated with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Bolus Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of boli associated with Beam. Required if Number of Boli (300A,00ED) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
table_lines.comment: sect_C.8.8.5sect_C.8.8.9

table_lines.name: >>Bolus ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for the Bolus.

table_lines.name: >>Bolus Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for the Bolus.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Blocks
table_lines.comment: Number of shielding blocks associated with Beam.

table_lines.name: >Total Block Tray Factor
table_lines.comment: Total block tray transmission for all block trays (between 0 and 1) at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111).

table_lines.name: >Block Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of blocks associated with Beam.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required if Number of Blocks (300A,00F0) is non-zero.

table_lines.name: >>Block Tray ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for block tray.

table_lines.name: >>Tray Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Tray intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Block intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Source to Block Tray Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation Source to attachment edge of block tray assembly (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Block Type
table_lines.comment: Type of block.

table_lines.name: >>Block Divergence
table_lines.comment: Indicates presence or otherwise of geometrical divergence.

table_lines.name: >>Block Mounting Position
table_lines.comment: Indicates on which side of the Block Tray the block is mounted.

table_lines.name: >>Block Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Block. The value of Block Number (300A,00FC) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Block Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for block.

table_lines.name: >>Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for material used to manufacture Block.

table_lines.name: >>Block Number of Points
table_lines.comment: Number of (x,y) pairs defining the block edge.

table_lines.name: >>Block Data
table_lines.comment: A data stream of (x,y) pairs that comprise the block edge. The number of pairs shall be equal to Block Number of Points (300A,0104), and the vertices shall be interpreted as a closed polygon. Coordinates are projected onto the machine isocentric plane in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (mm). See Note 4.

table_lines.name: >Applicator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Applicators associated with Beam.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Geometry Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Describes the applicator aperture geometry.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Aperture Shape
table_lines.comment: Aperture shape of the applicator.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Opening
table_lines.comment:
Opening (in mm) of the applicator's aperture in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system. In case of square-shaped applicator contains the length of the sides of the square. In case of circular-shaped applicators, contains the diameter of the circular aperture.
Required if Applicator Aperture Shape (300A,0432) is SYM_SQUARE or SYM_CIRCULAR.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Opening X
table_lines.comment:
Opening (in mm) of the applicator's aperture in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system in X-Direction.
Required if Applicator Aperture Shape (300A,0432) is SYM_RECTANGLE.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Opening Y
table_lines.comment:
Opening (in mm) of the applicator's aperture in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system in Y-Direction.
Required if Applicator Aperture Shape (300A,0432) is SYM_RECTANGLE.

table_lines.name: >> Source to Applicator Mounting Position Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to applicator mounting position distance (in mm) for current applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >General Accessory Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of General Accessories associated with this Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Number
table_lines.comment: Identification Number of the General Accessory. The value shall be unique within the Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Description
table_lines.comment: User supplied description of General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Type
table_lines.comment: Specifies the type of accessory.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: Machine-readable identifier for this accessory.

table_lines.name: >>Source to General Accessory Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to general accessory distance (in mm) for current accessory.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of Dose References for which verification control points are defined.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Depth Value Averaging Flag
table_lines.comment:
Whether or not the depth values have been averaged.
Required if the referenced beam describes an angular movement and the depth values change during movement.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Dose Verification Control Point Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Items containing Beam Dose Coordinate Verification Control Points.
Two or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment: The cumulative Meterset weight value, at which the beam dose point geometrical parameters apply.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Control Point Index
table_lines.comment:
Uniquely identifies the Control Point specified by Control Point Index (300A,0112) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).
See
Required, if the Referenced Cumulative Meterset corresponds to a Control Point in the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111).

table_lines.name: >>>Beam Dose Point Depth
table_lines.comment:
The depth (in mm) in the patient along a ray from the source to the dose point specified by the Dose Reference Point Coordinates (300A,0018) or the referenced ROI.
Required for all but the last Item in this Sequence and for the last Item if Depth Value Averaging Flag (300A,0093) has a value of NO.
See Note 6.

table_lines.name: >>>Beam Dose Point Equivalent Depth
table_lines.comment:
The radiological depth in mm (water-equivalent depth, taking tissue heterogeneity into account) in the patient along a ray from the source to the dose point specified by the Dose Reference Point Coordinates (300A,0018) or the referenced ROI.
Required for all but the last Item in this Sequence and for the last Item if Depth Value Averaging Flag (300A,0093) has a value of NO.
See Note 6.

table_lines.name: >>>Beam Dose Point SSD
table_lines.comment:
Source to patient surface (skin) distance in mm along a ray from the source to the dose point specified by the Dose Reference Point Coordinates (300A,0018) or the referenced ROI.
Required for all but the last Item in this Sequence and for the last Item if Depth Value Averaging Flag (300A,0093) has a value of NO.
See Note 6.

table_lines.name: >>>Beam Dose Point Source to External Contour Distance
table_lines.comment:
Source to External Contour distance in mm including devices associated with the patient anatomy model along a ray from the source to the dose point specified by the Dose Reference Point Coordinates (300A,0018) or the referenced ROI.
May be present for all but the last Item in this Sequence and for the last Item if Depth Value Averaging Flag (300A,0093) has a value of NO.
See

table_lines.name: >Number of Control Points
table_lines.comment:
Number of control points in Beam.
Value shall be greater than or equal to 2.

table_lines.name: >Control Point Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of machine configurations describing treatment beam.
The number of Items in this Sequence shall equal the value of Number of Control Points (300A,0110).
See

table_lines.name: >>Control Point Index
table_lines.comment: Index of current Control Point, starting at 0 for first Control Point.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment: A Sequence of Dose References for current Beam. One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Dose Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence describing related Instances of RT Dose (for grids, isodose curves, and named/unnamed point doses).
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required if RT Dose is being transmitted, and Dose Summation Type (3004,000A) equals CONTROL_POINT.

table_lines.name: >>Nominal Beam Energy
table_lines.comment: Nominal Beam Energy at control point (MV/MeV).

table_lines.name: >>Dose Rate Set
table_lines.comment: Dose Rate to be set on treatment machine for segment beginning at current control point (e.g., MU/min).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Position Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of Items describing Wedge Positions for the current control point.
Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence (300A,0111) if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero, and in subsequent control points if Wedge Position (300A,0118) changes during Beam. See
The number of Items in this Sequence shall equal the value of Number of Wedges (300A,00D0).

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Wedge described by Wedge Number (300A,00D2) in Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1).

table_lines.name: >>>Wedge Position
table_lines.comment: Position of Wedge at current Control Point.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Position Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions.
Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence (300A,0111), or if the values of the Beam Limiting Device change during the Beam, and if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is absent, or is present and has the value NO.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
In the first Control Point the number of Items shall be equal to the number of Items of Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,00B6).
In subsequent Control Points the Items present shall be only those whose values change during the Beam.

table_lines.name: >>>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator). The value of this Attribute shall correspond to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8) defined in an Item of Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,00B6).

table_lines.name: >>>Leaf/Jaw Positions
table_lines.comment: Positions of beam limiting device (collimator) leaf (element) or jaw pairs (in mm) in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate axis appropriate to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8), e.g., X-axis for MLCX, Y-axis for MLCY. Contains 2N values, where N is the Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs (300A,00BC) in Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,00B6). Values shall be listed in IEC leaf (element) subscript order 101, 102, … 1N, 201, 202, … 2N. See Note 3.

table_lines.name: >>Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Opening Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions.
Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence (300A,0111), or if the values of the Beam Limiting Device change during Beam and if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall equal the number of Items in Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1) in the first Control Point and be equal or less in subsequent Control Points.
See

table_lines.name: >>Gantry Angle
table_lines.comment:
Gantry angle of radiation source, i.e., orientation of IEC GANTRY coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence (300A,0111), or if Gantry Angle changes during Beam.
See

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Angle
table_lines.comment:
Beam Limiting Device angle, i.e., orientation of IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC GANTRY coordinate system (degrees). Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence (300A,0111), or if Beam Limiting Device Angle changes during Beam.
See

table_lines.name: >>Patient Support Angle
table_lines.comment:
Patient Support angle, i.e., orientation of IEC PATIENT SUPPORT (turntable) coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence (300A,0111), or if Patient Support Angle changes during Beam.
See

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Axis Distance
table_lines.comment: Distance (positive) from the IEC PATIENT SUPPORT vertical axis to the IEC TABLE TOP ECCENTRIC vertical axis (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Angle
table_lines.comment:
Table Top (non-isocentric) angle, i.e., orientation of IEC TABLE TOP ECCENTRIC coordinate system with respect to IEC PATIENT SUPPORT coordinate system (degrees). Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence (300A,0111), or if Table Top Eccentric Angle changes during Beam.
See

table_lines.name: >>Source to Surface Distance
table_lines.comment: Source to Patient Surface (skin) distance (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Source to External Contour Distance
table_lines.comment:
Source to External Contour distance (mm) including devices associated with the patient anatomy model. For dosimetric purposes this value may differ from the Source to Surface Distance (300A,0130).
See

C.8-51.table_caption: RT Brachy Application Setups Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Brachy Treatment Technique
table_lines.comment:
Type of brachytherapy treatment technique.
See

table_lines.name: Brachy Treatment Type
table_lines.comment: Type of brachytherapy treatment.

table_lines.name: Treatment Machine Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence describing treatment machine to be used for treatment delivery.
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Machine Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name identifying treatment machine to be used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of the equipment to be used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Name
table_lines.comment: Institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Address
table_lines.comment: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Name
table_lines.comment: Department in the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Type Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A coded description of the type of Department or Service within the healthcare facility.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer's Model Name
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Device Serial Number
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Date of Manufacture
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery was originally manufactured or re-manufactured (as opposed to refurbished).

table_lines.name: >Date of Installation
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery was installed in its current location. The equipment may or may not have been used prior to installation in its current location.

table_lines.name: Source Sequence
table_lines.comment: Sequence of Sources to be used within Application Setups. One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Source Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Source. The value of Source Number (300A,0212) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Source Serial Number
table_lines.comment: Identifier for the Source Instance. Identifies the actual source Instance of the source, to which Source Strength Reference Date (300A,022C) and Source Strength Reference Time (300A,022E) refer.

table_lines.name: >Source Model ID
table_lines.comment: Identifier for the Source Model. Identifies the model, the source Instance belongs to.

table_lines.name: >Source Description
table_lines.comment: Description of the source.

table_lines.name: >Source Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Source.

table_lines.name: >Source Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of Source.

table_lines.name: >Active Source Diameter
table_lines.comment: Diameter of active Source (mm).

table_lines.name: >Active Source Length
table_lines.comment: Length of active Source (mm).

table_lines.name: >Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for encapsulation material of active Source.

table_lines.name: >Source Isotope Name
table_lines.comment: Name of Isotope.

table_lines.name: >Source Isotope Half Life
table_lines.comment: Half-life of Isotope (days).

table_lines.name: >Source Strength Units
table_lines.comment:
Measurement unit of Source Strength.
Required if the source is not a gamma-emitting (photon) source. May be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >Reference Air Kerma Rate
table_lines.comment: Air Kerma Rate in air of Isotope specified at Source Strength Reference Date (300A,022C) and Source Strength Reference Time (300A,022E) (in uGy h

table_lines.name: >Source Strength
table_lines.comment:
Source Strength of Isotope at Source Strength Reference Date (300A,022C) and Source Strength Reference Time (300A,022E), in units specified in Source Strength Units (300A,0229).
Required if the source is not a gamma-emitting (photon) source. See

table_lines.name: >Source Strength Reference Date
table_lines.comment: Reference date for Reference Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) or Source Strength (300A,022B) of Isotope.

table_lines.name: >Source Strength Reference Time
table_lines.comment: Reference time for Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) or Source Strength (300A,022B) of Isotope.

table_lines.name: Application Setup Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Application Setups for current RT Plan.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Application Setup. The value of Application Setup Number (300A,0234) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >Template Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Template. The value of Template Number (300A,0240) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Template Type
table_lines.comment: User-defined type for Template Device.

table_lines.name: >Template Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Template Device.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Reference Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of reference images used for validation of current Application Setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Total Reference Air Kerma
table_lines.comment: Total Reference Air Kerma for current Application Setup, i.e., the product of Air Kerma Rate of all Sources in all Channels with their respective Channel Times (uGy at 1 m). Value shall be zero for non-gamma sources.

table_lines.name: >Brachy Accessory Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Brachy Accessory Devices associated with current Application Setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Brachy Accessory Device. The value of Brachy Accessory Device Number (300A,0262) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Brachy Accessory Device.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Brachy Accessory Device.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Brachy Accessory Device.

table_lines.name: >>Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for material of Brachy Accessory Device. See Note.

table_lines.name: >Channel Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Channels for current Application Setup.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Channel Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Channel. The value of Channel Number (300A,0282) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Channel Total Time
table_lines.comment: Total amount of time between first and final Control Points of the Brachy Control Point Sequence (300A,02D0) for current Channel (sec). Channel Total Time calculation is based upon the Reference Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) of the Referenced Source Number (300C,000E).

table_lines.name: >>Number of Pulses
table_lines.comment: Number of Pulses per fraction for current Channel. Required if Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is PDR.

table_lines.name: >>Pulse Repetition Interval
table_lines.comment: Pulse repetition interval (sec) for current Channel. Required if Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is PDR.

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Source Applicator. The value of Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Source Applicator. Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is present.

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Source Applicator. Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is present.

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Source Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator Length
table_lines.comment:
Length of Source Applicator (mm), defined as the distance between the connector of the applicator and the distal-most position of the source.
Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is present.

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator Tip Length
table_lines.comment:
Length of Source Applicator Tip (in mm), defined as the distance between the outer tip of the applicator and the center of the distal-most possible position of the source.
Required if Channel Effective Length (300A,0271) is present.
See

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of Source Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for material of Source Applicator wall. See Note.

table_lines.name: >>Source Applicator Step Size
table_lines.comment: Distance of path along channel (in mm) between adjacent (potential) dwell positions. Required if Source Movement Type (300A,0288) is STEPWISE.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Shape Referenced ROI Number
table_lines.comment:
Uniquely identifies the ROI representing the Applicator shape surrounding the Channel.
Defined in Structure Set ROI Sequence (3006,0020) within the RT Structure Set referenced by Referenced RT Structure Set Sequence (300C,0060).

table_lines.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
table_lines.comment:
Uniquely identifies the ROI representing the Channel shape.
Specified by ROI Number (3006,0022) in Structure Set ROI Sequence (3006,0020) in
Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is present. See

table_lines.name: >>Transfer Tube Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Transfer Tube. The value of Transfer Tube Number (300A,02A2) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Transfer Tube Length
table_lines.comment: Length of Transfer Tube of current afterloading Channel (mm). Required if value Transfer Tube Number (300A,02A2) is non-null.

table_lines.name: >>Channel Effective Length
table_lines.comment:
Length of Channel (in mm) defined as the distance between the connector on the afterloader and the center of the distal-most possible position of the source.
See

table_lines.name: >>Channel Inner Length
table_lines.comment:
The total physical inner length of channel (in mm). Specifies the distance between the connector on the afterloader and the end of the channel.
Required if Channel Effective Length (300A,0271) is present.
See

table_lines.name: >>Afterloader Channel ID
table_lines.comment:
Identification of the Channel connection on the afterloader.
See

table_lines.name: >>Channel Shield Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Channel Shields associated with current Channel.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >>>Channel Shield Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Channel Shield. The value of Channel Shield Number (300A,02B2) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>>Channel Shield ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Channel Shield.

table_lines.name: >>>Channel Shield Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Channel Shield.

table_lines.name: >>>Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for material of Channel Shield. See Note.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Source Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies the referenced Source within Source Sequence (300A,0210) for current Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >>Number of Control Points
table_lines.comment: Number of control points in Channel. For an N-segment Channel there will be 2N (stepwise movement) or N+1 (continuous movement) control points.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Control Point Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of machine configurations describing this Channel.
The number of Items in this Sequence shall equal the value of Number of Control Points (300A,0110).
See

table_lines.name: >>>Control Point Index
table_lines.comment: Index of current Control Point, starting at 0 for first Control Point.

table_lines.name: >>>Brachy Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of Dose References for current Channel.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: Approval Status
table_lines.comment: Approval status at the time the SOP Instance was created.

table_lines.name: Review Date
table_lines.comment: Date on which object was reviewed. Required if Approval Status (300E,0002) is APPROVED or REJECTED.

table_lines.name: Review Time
table_lines.comment: Time at which object was reviewed. Required if Approval Status (300E,0002) is APPROVED or REJECTED.

table_lines.name: Reviewer Name
table_lines.comment: Name of person who reviewed object. Required if Approval Status (300E,0002) is APPROVED or REJECTED.

C.8-53.table_caption: RT General Treatment Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Instance Number
table_lines.comment: Instance number identifying this particular Instance of the object.

table_lines.name: Treatment Date
table_lines.comment: sect_A.31

table_lines.name: Treatment Time
table_lines.comment: sect_A.31

table_lines.name: Referenced RT Plan Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Reference to a RT Plan.
Zero or one Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: Referenced Treatment Record Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Reference to RT Treatment Records to which the current RT Treatment Record is significantly related.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

C.8-54.table_caption: RT Treatment Machine Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Treatment Machine Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence describing treatment machine used for treatment delivery.
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Machine Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name identifying treatment machine used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of the equipment used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Name
table_lines.comment: Institution where the equipment is located that was used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Address
table_lines.comment: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that was used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Name
table_lines.comment: Department in the institution where the equipment is located that was used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Type Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A coded description of the type of Department or Service within the healthcare facility.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer's Model Name
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Device Serial Number
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment used for treatment delivery.

table_lines.name: >Date of Manufacture
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment used for treatment delivery was originally manufactured or re-manufactured (as opposed to refurbished).

table_lines.name: >Date of Installation
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment used for treatment delivery was installed in its current location. The equipment may or may not have been used prior to installation in its current location.

C.8-55.table_caption: Measured Dose Reference Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Measured Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses measured during treatment delivery, summed over entire session.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Measured Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Unique identifier of measured dose point. Required only if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present. It shall not be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >Dose Units
table_lines.comment: Units used to describe measured dose.

table_lines.name: >Measured Dose Value
table_lines.comment: Measured Dose in units specified by Dose Units (3004,0002).

table_lines.name: >Measured Dose Type
table_lines.comment: Type of dose measurement.

table_lines.name: >Measured Dose Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Dose Reference (e.g., "Exit dose", "Point A").

C.8-56.table_caption: Calculated Dose Reference Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses estimated for each treatment delivery.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Calculated Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Unique identifier of dose reference point within RT Treatment Record IOD. Required only if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present. It shall not be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >Calculated Dose Reference Dose Value
table_lines.comment: Calculated Dose (Gy).

table_lines.name: >Calculated Dose Reference Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Calculated Dose Reference.

C.8-57.table_caption: RT Beams Session Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Referenced Fraction Group Number
table_lines.comment: Identifier of Fraction Group within referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: Number of Fractions Planned
table_lines.comment: Total number of treatments (Fractions) planned for current Fraction Group.

table_lines.name: Primary Dosimeter Unit
table_lines.comment: Measurement unit of machine dosimeter.

table_lines.name: Treatment Session Beam Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Beams administered during treatment session.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Beam Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for delivered Beam.

table_lines.name: >Beam Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for delivered Beam.

table_lines.name: >Definition Source Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Instances containing the source of the Beam information.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >Beam Type
table_lines.comment: Motion characteristic of delivered Beam.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Type
table_lines.comment: Particle type of delivered Beam.

table_lines.name: >Primary Fluence Mode Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence defining whether the primary fluence of the treatment beam used a non-standard fluence-shaping when the beam was delivered.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Fluence Mode
table_lines.comment: Describes whether the fluence shaping is the standard mode for the beam or an alternate.

table_lines.name: >>Fluence Mode ID
table_lines.comment:
Identifier for the specific fluence-shaping mode.
Required if Fluence Mode (3002,0051) has value NON_STANDARD.

table_lines.name: >High-Dose Technique Type
table_lines.comment:
Type of high-dose treatment technique.
Required if treatment technique requires a dose that would normally require overriding of treatment machine safety controls.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Verification Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of verification images obtained during delivery of current beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Start Meterset
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Meterset Weight within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number at which image acquisition starts.

table_lines.name: >>End Meterset
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Meterset Weight within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number at which image acquisition ends.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses measured during treatment delivery for current Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Measured Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Measured Dose Reference specified by Measured Dose Reference Number (3008,0064) in Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0010). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present. It shall not be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses estimated for each treatment delivery.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Calculated Dose Reference specified by Calculated Dose Reference Number (3008,0072) within Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0070). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present.

table_lines.name: >>Calculated Dose Reference Dose Value
table_lines.comment: Calculated Dose (Gy).

table_lines.name: >Source-Axis Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to gantry rotation axis distance of the equipment that was used for beam delivery (mm).

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag
table_lines.comment: Whether the RT Beam Limiting Devices are specified by the Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1).

table_lines.name: >Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) leaf pair values.
Required if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is absent, or is present and has the value NO.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >>Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs
table_lines.comment: Number of leaf (element) or jaw pairs (equal to 1 for standard beam limiting device jaws).

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Descriptions.
Required if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.usage:
Device Type Code Sequence (3010,002E) within

See

table_lines.name: >Referenced Patient Setup Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Patient Setup used within current beam, specified by Patient Setup Number (300A,0182) within Patient Setup Sequence (300A,0180) of RT Treatment Record.

table_lines.name: >Number of Wedges
table_lines.comment: Number of wedges associated with current delivered Beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Wedge Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment wedges present during delivered Beam. Required if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Wedge. The value of Wedge Number (300A,00D2) shall be unique within the wedge Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Type
table_lines.comment: Type of wedge defined for delivered Beam.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for wedge.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Angle
table_lines.comment: Nominal wedge angle delivered (degrees).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Orientation
table_lines.comment: Orientation of wedge, i.e., orientation of IEC WEDGE FILTER coordinate system with respect to IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (degrees).

table_lines.name: >Number of Compensators
table_lines.comment: Number of compensators associated with current delivered Beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Compensator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment compensators associated with current Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Compensator Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies compensator specified by Compensator Number (300A,00E4) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of compensator (if any).

table_lines.name: >>Compensator ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Compensator intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Tray ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for compensator tray.

table_lines.name: >>Tray Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Tray intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Boli
table_lines.comment: Number of boli used with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Bolus Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of boli associated with Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
table_lines.comment: sect_C.8.8.5sect_A.19sect_C.8.8.17

table_lines.name: >>Bolus ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for the Bolus.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Blocks
table_lines.comment: Number of shielding blocks or Electron Inserts associated with Beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Block Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of blocks associated with current Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Block Tray ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for block tray or Electron Insert.

table_lines.name: >>Tray Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Tray intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the Block intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Block Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies block specified by Block Number (300A,00FC) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Block Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for block.

table_lines.name: >Applicator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Applicators associated with Beam.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Geometry Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Describes the applicator aperture geometry.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Aperture Shape
table_lines.comment: Aperture shape of the applicator.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Opening
table_lines.comment:
Opening (in mm) of the applicator's aperture in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system. In case of square-shaped applicator contains the length of the sides of the square. In case of circular-shaped applicators, contains the diameter of the circular aperture.
Required if Applicator Aperture Shape (300A,0432) is SYM_SQUARE or SYM_CIRCULAR.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Opening X
table_lines.comment:
Opening (in mm) of the applicator's aperture in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system in X-Direction.
Required if Applicator Aperture Shape (300A,0432) is SYM_RECTANGLE.

table_lines.name: >>>Applicator Opening Y
table_lines.comment:
Opening (in mm) of the applicator's aperture in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system in Y-Direction.
Required if Applicator Aperture Shape (300A,0432) is SYM_RECTANGLE.

table_lines.name: >> Source to Applicator Mounting Position Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to applicator mounting position distance (in mm) for current applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >General Accessory Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of General Accessories associated with this Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Number
table_lines.comment: Identification Number of the General Accessory. The value shall be unique within the Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Description
table_lines.comment: User supplied description of General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Type
table_lines.comment: Specifies the type of accessory.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: Machine-readable identifier for this accessory.

table_lines.name: >>Source to General Accessory Distance
table_lines.comment: Radiation source to general accessory distance (in mm) for current accessory.

table_lines.name: >Current Fraction Number
table_lines.comment: Fraction number for this beam administration.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
table_lines.comment: Delivery Type of treatment.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Termination Status
table_lines.comment: Conditions under which treatment was terminated.

table_lines.name: >RT Treatment Termination Reason Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Identifies the reason why the current treatment beam has terminated.
Expected if the Treatment Termination Status (3008,002A) is not NORMAL.
One or more items are permitted in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Machine-Specific Treatment Termination Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Machine-specific termination codes.
Expected if the RT Treatment Termination Reason Code is (110501, DCM, "Equipment failure").
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Treatment Termination Description
table_lines.comment:
A user-readable description for an abnormal termination.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Treatment Verification Status
table_lines.comment: Conditions under which treatment was verified by a verification system.

table_lines.name: >Specified Primary Meterset
table_lines.comment: Desired machine setting of primary Meterset.

table_lines.name: >Specified Secondary Meterset
table_lines.comment: Desired machine setting of secondary Meterset.

table_lines.name: >Delivered Primary Meterset
table_lines.comment: Machine setting actually delivered as recorded by primary Meterset.

table_lines.name: >Delivered Secondary Meterset
table_lines.comment: Machine setting actually delivered as recorded by secondary Meterset.

table_lines.name: >Dose Calibration Conditions Verified Flag
table_lines.comment: Indicates whether the delivered plan was verified against calibration conditions of the delivery device.

table_lines.name: >Dose Calibration Conditions Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Dose calibration conditions for the delivered beam.
Required if Dose Calibration Conditions Verified Flag (300C,0123) is present and equals YES and Radiation Device Configuration and Commissioning Key Sequence (300A,065A) is absent.
May be present if Dose Calibration Conditions Verified Flag (300C,0123) is present and equals YES and Radiation Device Configuration and Commissioning Key Sequence (300A,065A) is present.
Only a single Item shall be present in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Absorbed Dose to Meterset Ratio
table_lines.comment: Ratio of absorbed dose in Gy to Meterset as defined by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3) in the reference conditions.

table_lines.name: >>Delineated Radiation Field Size
table_lines.comment: Field size in mm in X and Y directions in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system, specified by a numeric pair, X value then Y value.

table_lines.name: >>Calibration Reference Point Depth
table_lines.comment: Calibration reference point depth in mm from the phantom surface.

table_lines.name: >>Source to Surface Distance
table_lines.comment: Distance in mm from the radiation source to the phantom surface during calibration.

table_lines.name: >>Calibration DateTime
table_lines.comment: Date and time the calibration was performed.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Device Configuration and Commissioning Key Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Keys identifying the configuration and commissioning data used as input for treatment planning of this Instance.
Value Type (0040,A040) is constrained to value UIDREF.
Required if Dose Calibration Conditions Verified Flag (300C,0123) is present and equals YES and Dose Calibration Conditions Sequence (300C,0120) is absent.
May be present if Dose Calibration Conditions Sequence (300C,0120) is present.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Interlock Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Interlocks that occurred prior, during or after the delivery of radiation of this beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Specified Treatment Time
table_lines.comment: Treatment Time set (sec).

table_lines.name: >Delivered Treatment Time
