table_lines.comment: Treatment Time actually delivered (sec).

table_lines.name: >Gating Beam Hold Transition Sequence
table_lines.comment: One or more items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Hold Transition
table_lines.comment: Beam hold transition during irradiation.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Hold Transition Trigger Source
table_lines.comment: he source that caused the beam hold transition to occur.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Hold Transition DateTime
table_lines.comment: DateTime of the beam hold transition.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Hold Originating Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
The device that triggered the beam hold.
Required if there are multiple devices in the treatment delivery device that can trigger the beam hold.
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Number of Control Points
table_lines.comment:
Number of control points delivered.
Value shall be greater than or equal to 2.

table_lines.name: >Control Point Delivery Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam control points for current treatment beam.
The number of Items in this Sequence shall equal the value of Number of Control Points (300A,0110).
See

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Control Point Index
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Control Point specified by Control Point Index (300A,0112) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Treatment Control Point Date
table_lines.comment: Date when the delivery of radiation at this control point began. For the final control point this shall be the Date when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>Treatment Control Point Time
table_lines.comment: Time when the delivery of radiation at this control point began. For the final control point this shall be the Time when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>Dose Rate Set
table_lines.comment: Dose Rate set on treatment machine for segment beginning at current control point (Meterset/min).

table_lines.name: >>Dose Rate Delivered
table_lines.comment: Dose Rate actually delivered for segment beginning at current control point (Meterset/min).

table_lines.name: >>Nominal Beam Energy
table_lines.comment: Nominal Beam Energy at control point.

table_lines.name: >>Nominal Beam Energy Unit
table_lines.comment:
Units used for Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114). Required if Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) is present.
If Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is PHOTON, Nominal Beam Energy Unit (300A,0015) shall be MV. If Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is ELECTRON, Nominal Beam Energy Unit (300A,0015) shall be MEV.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Position Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Wedge positions for current control point.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies wedge specified by Wedge Number (300A,00D2) within the Recorded Wedge Sequence (3008,00B0).

table_lines.name: >>>Wedge Position
table_lines.comment: Position of Wedge at current control point.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Position Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions.
Required for the first Control Point of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040), or if any value of the Leaf/Jaw Positions (300A,011C) changes during beam administration and if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is absent, or is present has the value NO.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
In the first Control Point the number of Items shall be equal to the number of Items of Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence (3008,00A0).
In subsequent Control Points the Items present shall be only those whose values change during the Beam.

table_lines.name: >>>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device. The value of this Attribute shall correspond to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8) defined in an element of Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence (3008,00A0).

table_lines.name: >>>Leaf/Jaw Positions
table_lines.comment: Positions of beam limiting device (collimator) leaf (element) or jaw pairs (mm) in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate axis appropriate to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8), e.g., X-axis for MLCX, Y-axis for MLCY. Contains 2N values, where N is the Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs (300A,00BC) defined in element of Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence (3008,00A0). Values shall be in IEC leaf subscript order 101, 102, … 1N, 201, 202 … 2N.

table_lines.name: >>Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Opening Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions.
Required for the first Control Point of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040), or if the values of Beam Limiting Device change during the Beam and if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall equal the number of Items in Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1) in the first Control Point and be equal or less in subsequent Control Points.
See

table_lines.name: >>Gantry Angle
table_lines.comment: Treatment machine gantry angle, i.e., orientation of IEC GANTRY coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Gantry Angle changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Gantry Rotation Direction
table_lines.comment: Direction of Gantry Rotation when viewing gantry from isocenter, for segment beginning at current Control Point. Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040), or if Gantry Rotation Direction changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Stopper Position
table_lines.comment: Position of Beam Stopper during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Angle
table_lines.comment: Beam Limiting Device (collimator) angle, i.e., orientation of IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC GANTRY coordinate system (degrees). Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if beam limiting device (collimator) angle changes during beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Rotation Direction
table_lines.comment: Direction of Beam Limiting Device Rotation when viewing beam limiting device (collimator) from radiation source, for segment beginning at current Control Point. Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Beam Limiting Device Rotation Direction changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Patient Support Angle
table_lines.comment: Patient Support angle, i.e., orientation of IEC PATIENT SUPPORT (turntable) coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Patient Support Angle changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Patient Support Rotation Direction
table_lines.comment: Direction of Patient Support Rotation when viewing table from above, for segment beginning at current Control Point. Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040), or if Patient Support Rotation Direction changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Axis Distance
table_lines.comment: Distance (positive) from the IEC PATIENT SUPPORT vertical axis to the IEC TABLE TOP ECCENTRIC vertical axis (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Angle
table_lines.comment: Table Top (non-isocentric) angle, i.e., orientation of IEC TABLE TOP ECCENTRIC coordinate system with respect to IEC PATIENT SUPPORT coordinate system (degrees). Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Table Top Eccentric Angle changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Rotation Direction
table_lines.comment: Direction of Table Top Eccentric Rotation when viewing table from above, for segment beginning at current Control Point. Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Table Top Eccentric Rotation Direction changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Vertical Position
table_lines.comment: Table Top Vertical position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). This value is interpreted as an absolute, rather than relative, Table setting. Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Table Top Vertical Position changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Longitudinal Position
table_lines.comment: Table Top Longitudinal position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). This value is interpreted as an absolute, rather than relative, Table setting. Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Table Top Longitudinal Position changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Lateral Position
table_lines.comment: Table Top Lateral position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). This value is interpreted as an absolute, rather than relative, Table setting. Required for Control Point 0 of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040) or if Table Top Lateral Position changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Corrected Parameter Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of Items describing any corrections made to any Attributes prior to delivery of the next control point.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Sequence Pointer
table_lines.comment:
Contains the Data Element Tag of the parent Sequence containing the Attribute that was corrected.
The value is limited in scope to the Treatment Session Beam Sequence (3008,0020) and all nested Sequences therein.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Item Index
table_lines.comment: Contains the Sequence Item index (starting at 1) of the corrected Attribute within its parent Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the Attribute that was corrected.

table_lines.name: >>>Correction Value
table_lines.comment: The value applied to the Attribute that was referenced by the Parameter Sequence Pointer (3008,0061), Parameter Item Index (3008,0063) and Parameter Pointer (3008,0065).

table_lines.name: >>Override Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of parameters that were overridden during the administration of the beam segment immediately prior to the current control point.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Override Parameter Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the Attribute that was overridden.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Sequence Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the parent Sequence containing the Attribute that was overridden. The value is limited in scope to the Treatment Session Beam Sequence (3008,0020) and all nested Sequences therein.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Item Index
table_lines.comment: Contains the Sequence Item index (monotonically increasing from 1) of the overridden Attributes within its parent Sequence. The value is limited in scope to the Treatment Session Beam Sequence (3008,0020) and all nested Sequences therein.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Value Number
table_lines.comment: Positive integer identifying which value of a multi-valued Attribute identified by Override Parameter Pointer (3008,0062) is referenced. The value 1 identifies the first value.

table_lines.name: >>>Operators' Name
table_lines.comment: Name of operator who authorized override.

table_lines.name: >>>Operator Identification Sequence
table_lines.comment: Identification of the operator who authorized override. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Override Reason
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of reason for override of parameter specified by Override Parameter Pointer (3008,0062).

C.8-58.table_caption: RT Brachy Session Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Referenced Fraction Group Number
table_lines.comment: Identifier of Fraction Group within referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: Number of Fractions Planned
table_lines.comment: Total number of treatments (Fractions) planned for current Fraction Group.

table_lines.name: Brachy Treatment Technique
table_lines.comment:
Type of brachytherapy treatment technique.
See

table_lines.name: Brachy Treatment Type
table_lines.comment: Type of brachytherapy treatment.

table_lines.name: Recorded Source Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Sources to be used within Application Setups.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Source Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Source. The value of Source Number (300A,0212) shall be unique within the Recorded Source Sequence (3008,0100) in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Source Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Source.

table_lines.name: >Source Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of source.

table_lines.name: >Source Serial Number
table_lines.comment: Serial Number of source.

table_lines.name: >Source Isotope Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name of Isotope.

table_lines.name: >Source Isotope Half Life
table_lines.comment: Half-life of Isotope (days).

table_lines.name: >Source Strength Units
table_lines.comment:
Measurement unit of Source Strength.
Required if the source is not a gamma-emitting (photon) source. May be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >Reference Air Kerma Rate
table_lines.comment: Air Kerma Rate in air of Isotope specified at Source Strength Reference Date (300A,022C) and Source Strength Reference Time (300A,022E) (in uGy h

table_lines.name: >Source Strength
table_lines.comment:
Source Strength of Isotope at Source Strength Reference Date (300A,022C) and Source Strength Reference Time (300A,022E), in units specified in Source Strength Units (300A,0229).
Required if the source is not a gamma-emitting (photon) source. See

table_lines.name: >Source Strength Reference Date
table_lines.comment: Reference date for Reference Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) or Source Strength (300A,022B) of Isotope.

table_lines.name: >Source Strength Reference Time
table_lines.comment: Reference time for Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) or Source Strength (300A,022B) of Isotope.

table_lines.name: Treatment Session Application Setup Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Application Setups for RT Treatment Record for current RT Plan.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >Template Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Template.

table_lines.name: >Template Type
table_lines.comment: User-defined type for Template Device.

table_lines.name: >Template Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Template Device.

table_lines.name: >Application Setup Check
table_lines.comment: Results of check-wire travel through all channels of current Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Verification Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of verification images obtained during delivery of current Application Setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Total Reference Air Kerma
table_lines.comment: Total Reference Air Kerma for current Application Setup, i.e., the sum of the products of the Air Kerma Rates of each Source in each Channel with its respective Channel Time (uGy at 1 m). Value shall be zero for non-gamma sources.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses measured during treatment delivery, summed over entire session.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Measured Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Measured Dose Reference specified by Measured Dose Reference Number (3008,0064) in Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0010). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present. It shall not be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses estimated for each treatment delivery.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Calculated Dose Reference specified by Calculated Dose Reference Number (3008,0072) within Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0070). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present. It shall not be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >>Calculated Dose Reference Dose Value
table_lines.comment: Calculated Dose (Gy).

table_lines.name: >Current Fraction Number
table_lines.comment: Fraction number for this application setup.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
table_lines.comment: Delivery Type of treatment.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Termination Status
table_lines.comment: Conditions under which treatment was terminated.

table_lines.name: >RT Treatment Termination Reason Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Identifies the reason why the current treatment beam has terminated.
Expected if the Treatment Termination Status (3008,002A) is not NORMAL.
One or more items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >Machine-Specific Treatment Termination Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Machine-specific termination codes.
Expected if the RT Treatment Termination Reason Code is (110501, DCM, "Equipment failure").
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >Treatment Termination Description
table_lines.comment:
A user-readable description for an abnormal termination.
See

table_lines.name: >Treatment Verification Status
table_lines.comment: Conditions under which treatment was verified by a verification system.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Brachy Accessory Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Brachy Accessory Devices associated with current Application Setup.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Brachy Accessory Device Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Brachy Accessory Device. The value of Brachy Accessory Device Number (300A,0262) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Brachy Accessory Device.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Brachy Accessory Device.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Brachy Accessory Device.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Channel Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Channels for current Application Setup.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Channel Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Channel. The value of Channel Number (300A,0282) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Channel Number
table_lines.comment: The channel to be delivered, specified by the value of Channel Number (300A,0282) in referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: >>Channel Length
table_lines.comment: sect_A.20

table_lines.name: >>Channel Effective Length
table_lines.comment:
Length of Channel (in mm) defined as the distance between the connector on the afterloader and the center of the distal-most possible position of the source.
See

table_lines.name: >>Channel Inner Length
table_lines.comment:
The total physical inner length of channel (in mm). Specifies the distance between the connector on the afterloader and the end of the channel.
Required if Channel Effective Length (300A,0271) is present.
See

table_lines.name: >>Afterloader Channel ID
table_lines.comment:
Identification of the Channel connection on the afterloader.
See

table_lines.name: >>Specified Channel Total Time
table_lines.comment:
Total amount of time in seconds, scaled for the current source delivery strength and other delivery factors, specified to be delivered at the time of treatment between the first Control Point and the final Control Point for the current Channel.
In the case of resuming a partially delivered treatment, the Specified Channel Total time will only include the remainder to be treated.
See

table_lines.name: >>Delivered Channel Total Time
table_lines.comment: Total amount of time in seconds actually delivered between Control Point 0 and final Control Point of the Brachy Control Point Delivered Sequence (3008,0160) for current Channel.

table_lines.name: >>Source Movement Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Source movement.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses measured during treatment delivery, summed over entire session.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Measured Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: References Measured Dose Reference specified by Measured Dose Reference Number (3008,0064) in Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0010). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present. It shall not be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >>>Measured Dose Value
table_lines.comment: Measured Dose.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses estimated for each treatment delivery.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Calculated Dose Reference specified by Calculated Dose Reference Number (3008,0072) within Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0070). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present. It shall not be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: >>>Calculated Dose Reference Dose Value
table_lines.comment: Calculated Dose (Gy).

table_lines.name: >>Recorded Source Applicator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of recorded Source Applicators.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Source Applicator Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Source Applicator. The value of Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>>Source Applicator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Source Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>>Source Applicator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Source Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>>Source Applicator Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Source Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>>Source Applicator Length
table_lines.comment: Length of Source Applicator (mm), defined as the distance between the connector of the applicator and the distal-most position of the source.

table_lines.name: >>>Source Applicator Tip Length
table_lines.comment:
Length of Source Applicator Tip (in mm), defined as the distance between the outer tip of the applicator and the center of the distal-most possible position of the source.
Required if Channel Effective Length (300A,0271) is present.
See

table_lines.name: >>>Source Applicator Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of Source Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>>Source Applicator Step Size
table_lines.comment: Distance of path along channel (mm) between adjacent (potential) dwell positions. Required if Source Movement Type (300A,0288) is STEPWISE.

table_lines.name: >>Transfer Tube Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Transfer Tube. The value of Transfer Tube Number (300A,02A2) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Transfer Tube Length
table_lines.comment: Length of Transfer Tube of current afterloading Channel (mm). Required if value Transfer Tube Number (300A,02A2) is not zero length.

table_lines.name: >>Recorded Channel Shield Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Channel Shields associated with current Channel.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Channel Shield Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Channel Shield. The value of Channel Shield Number (300A,02B2) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>>Channel Shield ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Channel Shield.

table_lines.name: >>>Channel Shield Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for Channel Shield.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Source Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies the referenced Source within the Recorded Source Sequence (3008,0100) for current Application Setup.

table_lines.name: >>Safe Position Exit Date
table_lines.comment: Date on which the source(s) exited the safe. Required if Recorded Channel Sequence (3008,0130) is present and Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is not MANUAL or PDR.

table_lines.name: >>Safe Position Exit Time
table_lines.comment: Time on which the source(s) exited the safe. Required if Recorded Channel Sequence (3008,0130) is present and Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is not MANUAL or PDR.

table_lines.name: >>Safe Position Return Date
table_lines.comment: Date on which the source(s) returned to the safe. Required if Recorded Channel Sequence (3008,0130) is present and Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is not MANUAL or PDR.

table_lines.name: >>Safe Position Return Time
table_lines.comment: Time on which the source(s) returned to the safe. Required if Recorded Channel Sequence (3008,0130) is present and Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is not MANUAL or PDR.

table_lines.name: >>Number of Control Points
table_lines.comment: Number of control points in Channel. For an N-segment Channel there will be 2N (stepwise movement) or N+1 (continuous movement) control points.

table_lines.name: >>Brachy Control Point Delivered Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of machine configurations describing this Channel.
The number of Items in this Sequence shall equal the value of Number of Control Points (300A,0110).
See

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Control Point Index
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Control Point specified by Control Point Index (300A,0112) within Application Setup referenced by Referenced Brachy Application Setup Number (300C,000C).

table_lines.name: >>>Treatment Control Point Date
table_lines.comment: Date when the delivery of radiation at this control point began. For the final control point this shall be the Date when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>>Treatment Control Point Time
table_lines.comment: Time when the delivery of radiation at this control point began. For the final control point this shall be the Time when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>>Control Point Relative Position
table_lines.comment: sect_A.20

table_lines.name: >>>Override Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of parameters that were overridden during the administration of the treatment immediately prior to the current control point.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>>Override Parameter Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the Attribute that was overridden.

table_lines.name: >>>>Operators' Name
table_lines.comment: Name of operator who authorized override.

table_lines.name: >>>>Operator Identification Sequence
table_lines.comment: Identification of the operator who authorized override. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>>Override Reason
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of reason for override of parameter specified by Override Parameter Pointer (3008,0062).

table_lines.name: >>Pulse Specific Brachy Control Point Delivered Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Brachy Control Point Delivered Sequence for each PDR treatment pulse.
Number of Items in the Sequence shall be equal to the Delivered Number of Pulses (3008,0138).

table_lines.name: >>>Pulse Number
table_lines.comment:
Identification Number of this delivered Pulse.
The pulse numbers for a treatment start at 1 and increase monotonically by 1. A given SOP Instance might only contain some of the pulses of the given treatment.

table_lines.name: >>>Safe Position Exit Date
table_lines.comment: Date on which the source(s) exited the safe.

table_lines.name: >>>Safe Position Exit Time
table_lines.comment: Time at which the source(s) exited the safe.

table_lines.name: >>>Safe Position Return Date
table_lines.comment: Date on which the source(s) returned to the safe.

table_lines.name: >>>Safe Position Return Time
table_lines.comment: Time at which the source(s) returned to the safe.

table_lines.name: >>>Brachy Pulse Control Point Delivered Sequence
table_lines.comment:
List of control points for this pulse.
See

table_lines.name: >>>>Referenced Control Point Index
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Control Point specified by Control Point Index (300A,0112) within Application Setup referenced by Referenced Brachy Application Setup Number (300C,000C).

table_lines.name: >>>>Treatment Control Point Date
table_lines.comment:
Date when the delivery of radiation at this control point began.
For the final control point, this shall be the Date when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>>>Treatment Control Point Time
table_lines.comment:
Time when the delivery of radiation at this control point began.
For the final control point, this shall be the Time when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>>>Control Point Relative Position
table_lines.comment:
Distance in mm between current Control Point Position and the center of the distal-most possible Source position in current Channel.
See

table_lines.name: >>>>Override Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Parameters which were overridden during the administration of the treatment immediately prior to the current control point.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>>>Override Parameter Pointer
table_lines.comment: Data Element Tag of the Attribute that was overridden.

table_lines.name: >>>>>Operators' Name
table_lines.comment: Name of operator who authorized override.

table_lines.name: >>>>>Operator Identification Sequence
table_lines.comment: Identification of the operator who authorized override. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>>>Override Reason
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of reason for override.

C.8-59.table_caption: RT Treatment Summary Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Current Treatment Status
table_lines.comment:
Status of the Treatment at the time the Treatment Summary was created.
See

table_lines.name: Treatment Status Comment
table_lines.comment: Comment on current treatment status.

table_lines.name: First Treatment Date
table_lines.comment: Date of delivery of the first treatment.

table_lines.name: Most Recent Treatment Date
table_lines.comment: Date of delivery of the most recent administration.

table_lines.name: Fraction Group Summary Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence describing current state of planned vs. delivered fraction groups.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Fraction Group Number
table_lines.comment: References Fraction Group Number (300A,0071) in Fraction Group Sequence (300A,0070) in the referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: >Fraction Group Type
table_lines.comment: Indicates type of fraction group.

table_lines.name: >Number of Fractions Planned
table_lines.comment: Number of fractions planned for this fraction group.

table_lines.name: >Number of Fractions Delivered
table_lines.comment: Number of fractions delivered as of Treatment Summary Report.

table_lines.name: >Fraction Status Summary Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence describing status of fractions in Fraction Group.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Fraction Number
table_lines.comment: Identifies fraction.

table_lines.name: >>Treatment Date
table_lines.comment: Date when fraction was delivered.

table_lines.name: >>Treatment Time
table_lines.comment: Time when fraction was delivered.

table_lines.name: >>Treatment Termination Status
table_lines.comment: Conditions under which treatment was terminated.

table_lines.name: Treatment Summary Measured Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of references to Measured Dose References.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Dose Reference Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Dose Reference.

table_lines.name: >Cumulative Dose to Dose Reference
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Dose delivered to Dose Reference (Gy).

table_lines.name: Treatment Summary Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of references to Calculated Dose References.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Dose Reference Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Dose Reference.

table_lines.name: >Cumulative Dose to Dose Reference
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Dose delivered to Dose Reference (Gy).

C.8.8.24-1.table_caption: RT Ion Tolerance Tables Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Ion Tolerance Table Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of ion tolerance tables to be used for delivery of treatment plan.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Tolerance Table Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Tolerance Table. The value of Tolerance Table Number (300A,0042) shall be unique within the RT Ion Plan in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >Tolerance Table Label
table_lines.comment: User-defined label for Tolerance Table.

table_lines.name: >Gantry Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Gantry Angle.

table_lines.name: >Beam Limiting Device Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Beam Limiting Device Angle.

table_lines.name: >Beam Limiting Device Tolerance Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) tolerances.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered leaf (element) or jaw positions for current beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >Patient Support Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Patient Support Angle.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Vertical Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Vertical Position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Longitudinal Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Longitudinal Position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Lateral Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Lateral Position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Pitch Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Table Top Pitch Angle.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Roll Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Table Top Roll Angle.

table_lines.name: >Snout Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Snout Position.

table_lines.name: >Head Fixation Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Head Fixation Angle (300A,0148).

table_lines.name: >Chair Head Frame Position Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Chair Head Frame Position (300A,0151).

table_lines.name: >Fixation Light Azimuthal Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Fixation Light Azimuthal Angle (300A,0356).

table_lines.name: >Fixation Light Polar Angle Tolerance
table_lines.comment: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Fixation Light Polar Angle (300A,0358).

table_lines.name: Ion Beam Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of setup and/or treatment beams for current RT Ion Plan.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Beam Type
table_lines.comment: Motion characteristic of Beam.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Type
table_lines.comment: Particle type of Beam.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Mass Number
table_lines.comment: Mass number of radiation. Required if Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is ION.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Atomic Number
table_lines.comment: Atomic number of radiation. Required if Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is ION.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Charge State
table_lines.comment: Charge state of radiation. Required if Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is ION.

table_lines.name: >Scan Mode
table_lines.comment: The method of beam scanning to be used during treatment.

table_lines.name: >Modulated Scan Mode Type
table_lines.comment:
Defines the specialization of a modulated scan mode.
Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED_SPEC.
See

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer of the equipment to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Name
table_lines.comment: Institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institution Address
table_lines.comment: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Name
table_lines.comment: Department in the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Institutional Department Type Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A coded description of the type of Department or Service within the healthcare facility.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Manufacturer's Model Name
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Device Serial Number
table_lines.comment: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Date of Manufacture
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery was originally manufactured or re-manufactured (as opposed to refurbished).

table_lines.name: >Date of Installation
table_lines.comment: The date the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery was installed in its current location. The equipment may or may not have been used prior to installation in its current location.

table_lines.name: >Primary Dosimeter Unit
table_lines.comment: Measurement unit of machine dosimeter.

table_lines.name: >Virtual Source-Axis Distances
table_lines.comment:
Distance (in mm) from virtual source position to gantry rotation axis or nominal isocenter position (fixed beam-lines) of the equipment to be used for beam delivery. Specified by a numeric pair - the VSAD in the IEC Gantry X direction followed by the VSAD in the IEC Gantry Y direction.
The VSAD is commonly used for designing apertures in contrast to the effective source-axis-distance (ESAD) that is commonly used with the inverse square law for calculating the dose decrease with distance. See

table_lines.name: >Depth Dose Parameters Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Set of parameters describing the depth dose distribution.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Reference Dose Definition
table_lines.comment:
Definition of the 100% reference dose level.
See

table_lines.name: >>Distal Depth
table_lines.comment:
Penetration depth in water (mm) of the particle excluding any user-installed range modifying devices, measured at the Distal Depth Fraction (300A,0501).
See

table_lines.name: >>Distal Depth Fraction
table_lines.comment:
Fraction of the value of dose relative to the 100% level defined by Reference Dose Definition (300A,0512). This determines the Distal Depth (300A,0502).
A value of 1.0 refers to 100% of the reference dose level defined by the Reference Dose Definition (300A,0512).
See

table_lines.name: >>Nominal Range Modulated Region Depths
table_lines.comment:
The depths of the proximal and distal limits of the range modulated region in water.
Contains two values (in mm). The first value defines the depth of the proximal limit. The second value defines the depth of the distal limit.
Required if Reference Dose Definition (300A,0512) has the value CENTER.
See

table_lines.name: >>Nominal Range Modulation Fractions
table_lines.comment:
Fractions of the Reference Dose Definition (300A,0512) defining the proximal and distal limits at which the range-modulated region is defined.
Contains two values. The first value defines the modulation fraction value at the proximal limit and the second value defines the modulation fraction value at the distal limit.
A value of 1.0 refers to the 100% reference dose level as defined in Reference Dose Definition (300A,0512).
Required if Nominal Range Modulated Region Depths (300A,0504) is present.
See

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag
table_lines.comment: Whether the RT Beam Limiting Devices are specified by the Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1).

table_lines.name: >Ion Beam Limiting Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) sets.
Shall not be present if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >>Isocenter to Beam Limiting Device Distance
table_lines.comment:
Isocenter to beam limiting device (collimator) distance (in mm) of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery.
See

table_lines.name: >>Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs
table_lines.comment: Number of leaf (element) or jaw pairs (equal to 1 for standard beam limiting device jaws).

table_lines.name: >>Leaf Position Boundaries
table_lines.comment:
Boundaries of beam limiting device (collimator) leaves (in mm) in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate axis appropriate to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8), i.e., X-axis for MLCY, Y-axis for MLCX.
Contains N+1 values, where N is the Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs (300A,00BC), starting from Leaf (Element) Pair 1. Required if RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8) is MLCX or MLCY. May be present otherwise. See

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Descriptions.
Required if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.usage:
Device Type Code Sequence (3010,002E) within

See

table_lines.name: >Referenced Reference Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Reference images used for validation of current beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Reference Image Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Reference Image within Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300C,0042).

table_lines.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
table_lines.comment: Delivery Type of treatment.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Dose Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Related Instances of RT Dose (for grids, isodose curves, and named/unnamed point doses).
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.usage: The Referenced Class SOP UID shall be that of the RT Dose SOP Class (1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.481.2).

table_lines.name: >Number of Wedges
table_lines.comment: Number of wedges associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Total Wedge Tray Water-Equivalent Thickness
table_lines.comment: Shift of the wedge tray induced on the range of the ion beam as measured in water (in mm).

table_lines.name: >Ion Wedge Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment wedges.
Required if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Wedges (300A,00D0).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Wedges. The value of Wedge Number (300A,00D2) shall be unique within the Beam in which it was created.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Type
table_lines.comment: Type of wedge (if any) defined for Beam.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for Wedge.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Angle
table_lines.comment: Nominal wedge angle (degrees).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Orientation
table_lines.comment: Orientation of wedge, i.e., orientation of IEC WEDGE FILTER coordinate system with respect to the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate systems (degrees).

table_lines.name: >>Isocenter to Wedge Tray Distance
table_lines.comment:
Isocenter to downstream edge of wedge tray (mm).
See

table_lines.name: >Number of Compensators
table_lines.comment: Number of compensators associated with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Total Compensator Tray Water-Equivalent Thickness
table_lines.comment: Water-Equivalent thickness of the compensator tray (in mm) parallel to radiation beam axis.

table_lines.name: >Ion Range Compensator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of compensators.
Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Compensators (300A,00E0).

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Description
table_lines.comment: User defined description for the compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Compensator. The value of Compensator Number (300A,00E4) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for material used to manufacture Compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for the compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Divergence
table_lines.comment: Indicates presence or absence of geometrical divergence of the range compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Mounting Position
table_lines.comment: Indicates on which side of the Compensator Tray the compensator is mounted.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Rows
table_lines.comment: Number of rows in the range compensator. A row is defined to be in the X direction of the IEC Beam Limiting Device Coordinate system.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Columns
table_lines.comment: Number of columns in the range compensator. A column is defined to be in the Y direction of the IEC Beam Limiting Device Coordinate system.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Position
table_lines.comment: The x and y coordinates of the upper left hand corner (first pixel transmitted) of the range compensator, projected onto the machine isocentric plane in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Column Offset
table_lines.comment: The offset distance (in mm) applied to the x coordinate of Compensator Position (300A,00EA) for even numbered rows. Required if the compensator pattern is hexagonal.

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Thickness Data
table_lines.comment: A data stream of the pixel samples that comprise the range compensator, expressed as physical thickness (in mm), either parallel to radiation beam axis if Compensator Divergence (300A,02E0) equals ABSENT, or divergent according to the beam geometrical divergence if Compensator Divergence (300A,02E0) equals PRESENT. The order of pixels encoded is left to right, top to bottom (upper left pixel, followed by the remainder of row 1, followed by the remainder of the rows).

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Relative Stopping Power Ratio
table_lines.comment: Compensator Linear Stopping Power Ratio, relative to water, at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Ion Control Point Sequence (300A,03A8).

table_lines.name: >>Compensator Milling Tool Diameter
table_lines.comment: The diameter (in mm) of the milling tool to be used to create the compensator. The diameter is expressed as the actual physical size and not a projected size at isocenter.

table_lines.name: >Number of Boli
table_lines.comment: Number of boli associated with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Bolus Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of boli associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Boli (300A,00ED) is non-zero.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Boli (300A,00ED).

table_lines.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
table_lines.comment: sect_C.8.8.5sect_C.8.8.9

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Blocks
table_lines.comment: Number of shielding blocks associated with Beam.

table_lines.name: >Total Block Tray Water-Equivalent Thickness
table_lines.comment: Water-Equivalent thickness of the block tray (in mm) parallel to radiation beam axis.

table_lines.name: >Ion Block Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of blocks associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Blocks (300A,00F0) is non-zero.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Blocks (300A,00F0).

table_lines.name: >>Block Tray ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for block tray.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment:
An identifier for the Block to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.
Shall not be present if Block Slab Sequence (300A,0441) is present within the same Item of Ion Block Sequence (300A,03A6) or when the Block Type (300A,00F8) has a value of APERTURE and Block Slab Sequence (300A,0441) is present in another Item having this value.

table_lines.name: >>Block Divergence
table_lines.comment: Indicates presence or otherwise of geometrical divergence.

table_lines.name: >>Block Mounting Position
table_lines.comment: Indicates on which side of the Block Tray the block is mounted.

table_lines.name: >>Block Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Block. The value of Block Number (300A,00FC) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Block Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for block.

table_lines.name: >>Material ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for material used to manufacture Block.

table_lines.name: >>Block Number of Points
table_lines.comment: Number of (x,y) pairs defining the block edge.

table_lines.name: >>Block Data
table_lines.comment:
A data stream of (x,y) pairs that comprise the block edge. The number of pairs shall be equal to Block Number of Points (300A,0104), and the vertices shall be interpreted as a closed polygon. Coordinates are projected onto the machine isocentric plane in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (mm).
See

table_lines.name: >>Number of Block Slab Items
table_lines.comment:
Number of Block Slabs comprising the Block.
Value shall be greater than 1.

table_lines.name: >>Block Slab Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of slab(s) that comprise the block.
Required if Number of Block Slab Items (300A,0440) is present.
Shall be present only in the first Item of Ion Block Sequence (300A,03A6) if multiple Items are present where Block Type (300A,00F8) has a value of APERTURE.
If this Sequence is present, Accessory Code (300A,00F9) shall not be present within the same Item of Ion Block Sequence (300A,03A6).
The number of Items included in this Sequence shall equal the value of Number of Block Slab Items (300A,0440).

table_lines.name: >>>Block Slab Number
table_lines.comment:
Identification number of the Block Slab.
The value shall start at 1, and increase monotonically by 1.
The number indicates the order of the slabs with respect to the source, where number 1 corresponds to the slab nearest to the source.

table_lines.name: >>>Block Slab Thickness
table_lines.comment:
Physical thickness of block slab (in mm) parallel to radiation beam axis.
The sum of the Block Slab Thickness (300A,0442) values of all Items of this Sequence shall be equal to the Block Thickness (300A,0100) of the block.

table_lines.name: >>>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: Machine-readable identifier for this Block Slab.

table_lines.name: >Snout Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Snouts associated with Beam.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Snout ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Snout.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >Applicator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Applicators associated with Beam.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >General Accessory Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of General Accessories associated with this Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Number
table_lines.comment: Identification Number of the General Accessory. The value shall be unique within the Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Description
table_lines.comment: User supplied description of General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Type
table_lines.comment: Specifies the type of accessory.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: Machine-readable identifier for this accessory.

table_lines.name: >>Isocenter to General Accessory Distance
table_lines.comment:
Isocenter to general accessory distance (in mm) for current accessory.
See

table_lines.name: >Number of Range Shifters
table_lines.comment: Number of range shifters associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Range Shifter Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of range shifters associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Range Shifters (300A,0312) is non-zero.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Range Shifters (300A,0312).

table_lines.name: >>Range Shifter Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Range Shifter. The value of Range Shifter Number (300A,0316) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Range Shifter ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Range Shifter.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Range Shifter Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Range Shifter.

table_lines.name: >>Range Shifter Description
table_lines.comment: User defined description of Range Shifter.

table_lines.name: >Number of Lateral Spreading Devices
table_lines.comment: Number of lateral spreading devices associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Lateral Spreading Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of lateral spreading devices associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Lateral Spreading Devices (300A,0330) is non-zero.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Lateral Spreading Devices (300A,0330).

table_lines.name: >>Lateral Spreading Device Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Lateral Spreading Device. The value of Lateral Spreading Device Number (300A,0334) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Lateral Spreading Device ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Lateral Spreading Device.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Lateral Spreading Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of Lateral Spreading Device.

table_lines.name: >>Lateral Spreading Device Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for lateral spreading device.

table_lines.name: >Number of Range Modulators
table_lines.comment: Number of range modulators associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Range Modulator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of range modulators associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Range Modulators (300A,0340) is non-zero.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Range Modulators (300A,0340).

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Range Modulator. The value of Range Modulator Number (300A,0344) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created.

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Range Modulator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator Type
table_lines.comment:
Type of Range Modulator.
Only one Item in the Range Modulator Sequence (300A,0342) can have a Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) of WHL_MODWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of Range Modulator.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Current Modulation ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for the beam current modulation pattern. Required if Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >Fixation Eye
table_lines.comment: The eye used for fixation.

table_lines.name: >Number of Control Points
table_lines.comment: Number of control points in Beam. Value shall be greater than or equal to 2.

table_lines.name: >Ion Control Point Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of machine configurations describing Ion treatment beam.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Control Points (300A,0110).
See

table_lines.name: >>Control Point Index
table_lines.comment: Index of current Control Point, starting at 0 for first Control Point.

table_lines.name: >>Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment: Cumulative weight to current control point. Cumulative Meterset Weight for the first Item in Control Point Sequence shall always be zero. Cumulative Meterset Weight for the final Item in Ion Control Point Sequence shall always be equal to Final Cumulative Meterset Weight.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of Dose References for current Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Cumulative Dose Reference Coefficient
table_lines.comment: Coefficient used to calculate cumulative dose contribution from this Beam to the referenced Dose Reference at the current Control Point.

table_lines.name: >>Nominal Beam Energy
table_lines.comment: Nominal Beam Energy at control point in MeV per nucleon. Defined at nozzle entrance before all Beam Modifiers. Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence, or if Nominal Beam Energy changes during Beam, and KVP (0018,0060) is not present.

table_lines.name: >>KVP
table_lines.comment: Peak kilo voltage output of the setup X-Ray generator to be used. Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence, or if kVp changes during setup, and Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) is not present.

table_lines.name: >>Meterset Rate
table_lines.comment: Specifies the speed of delivery of the specified dose in units specified by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3) per minute.

table_lines.name: >>Ion Wedge Position Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Wedge positions for current control point.
Required for first Item of Ion Control Point Sequence if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero, and in subsequent control points if Wedge Position (300A,0118) or Wedge Thin Edge Position (300A,00DB) changes during beam.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Wedges (300A,00D0).

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Wedge described by Wedge Number (300A,00D2) in Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1).

table_lines.name: >>>Wedge Position
table_lines.comment: Position of Wedge at current Control Point.

table_lines.name: >>Range Shifter Settings Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Range Shifter settings for the current control point.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence if Number of Range Shifters (300A,0312) is non-zero, or if Range Shifter Setting (300A,0362) changes during Beam.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Range Shifter Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Range Shifter described by Range Shifter Number (300A,0316) in Range Shifter Sequence (300A,0314).

table_lines.name: >>>Range Shifter Water Equivalent Thickness
table_lines.comment: Water equivalent thickness (in mm) of the range shifter at the central axis for the beam energy incident upon the device.

table_lines.name: >>Lateral Spreading Device Settings Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Lateral Spreading Device settings for the current control point.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence if Number of Lateral Spreading Devices (300A,0330) is non-zero, or if Lateral Spreading Device Setting (300A,0372) changes during Beam.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Lateral Spreading Device Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Lateral Spreading Device described by Lateral Spreading Device Number (300A,0334) in Lateral Spreading Device Sequence (300A,0332).

table_lines.name: >>>Lateral Spreading Device Water Equivalent Thickness
table_lines.comment: Water equivalent thickness (in mm) of the lateral spreading device at the central axis for the beam energy incident upon the device.

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator Settings Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Range Modulator Settings for current control point.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence if Number of Range Modulators (300A,0340) is non-zero, or if Range Modulator Setting changes during Beam.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Range Modulator Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Range Modulator described by Range Modulator Number (300A,0344) in Range Modulator Sequence (300A,0342).

table_lines.name: >>>Range Modulator Gating Start Value
table_lines.comment: Start position defines the range modulator position at which the beam is switched on. Required if Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) of the range modulator referenced by Referenced Range Modulator Number (300C,0104) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS or WHL_FIXEDWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >>>Range Modulator Gating Stop Value
table_lines.comment: Stop position defines the range modulator position at which the beam is switched off. Required if Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) of the range modulator referenced by Referenced Range Modulator Number (300C,0104) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS or WHL_FIXEDWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >>>Range Modulator Gating Start Water Equivalent Thickness
table_lines.comment:
If Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS or WHL_FIXEDWEIGHTS:
Water equivalent thickness (in mm) of the range modulator at the position specified by Range Modulator Gating Start Value (300A,0382).
If Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) is FIXED:
Minimum water equivalent thickness (in mm) of the range modulator.

table_lines.name: >>>Range Modulator Gating Stop Water Equivalent Thickness
table_lines.comment:
If Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS or WHL_FIXEDWEIGHTS:
Water equivalent thickness (in mm) of the range modulator at the position specified by Range Modulator Gating Stop Value (300A,0384).
If Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) is FIXED:
Maximum water equivalent thickness (in mm) of the range modulator.

table_lines.name: >>Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Opening Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions.
Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence, or if the values of the Beam Limiting Device the Beam and if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall equal the number of Items in Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1) in the first Control Point and be equal or less in subsequent Control Points.
See

table_lines.name: >>Gantry Angle
table_lines.comment: Gantry angle of radiation source, i.e., orientation of IEC GANTRY coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence, or if Gantry Angle changes during Beam.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Angle
table_lines.comment: Beam Limiting Device angle, i.e., orientation of IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC GANTRY coordinate system (degrees). Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence, or if Beam Limiting Device Angle changes during Beam.

table_lines.name: >>Scan Spot Tune ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied or machine code identifier for machine configuration to produce beam spot. This may be the nominal spot size or some other machine specific value. Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED or MODULATED_SPEC.

table_lines.name: >>Scan Spot Reordering Allowed
table_lines.comment: Indicates whether the spot delivery order shall remain the same as planned order.

table_lines.name: >>Number of Scan Spot Positions
table_lines.comment: Number of spot positions used to specify scanning pattern for current segment beginning at control point. Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED or MODULATED_SPEC.

table_lines.name: >>Scanning Spot Size
table_lines.comment: The Scanning Spot Size as calculated using the Full Width Half Maximum (FWHM). Specified by a numeric pair - the size measured in air at isocenter in IEC GANTRY X direction followed by the size in the IEC GANTRY Y direction (mm).

table_lines.name: >>Number of Paintings
table_lines.comment: The number of times the scan pattern given by Scan Spot Position Map (300A,0394) and Scan Spot Meterset Weights (300A,0396) shall be applied at the current control point. To obtain the Meterset weight per painting, the values in the Scan Spot Meterset Weights (300A,0396) should be divided by the value of this Attribute. Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED or MODULATED_SPEC.

table_lines.name: >>Patient Support Angle
table_lines.comment: Patient Support angle, i.e., orientation of IEC PATIENT SUPPORT (turntable) coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for first Item of Control Point Sequence, or if Patient Support Angle changes during Beam.

table_lines.name: >>Chair Head Frame Position
table_lines.comment:
A device-specific value that specifies the relationship between the chair in which the patient is sitting and the head frame in which their head is fixed.
It shall be expressed as a distance in mm, such that positive is towards the patient's head away from the seat.
Typically used for eye treatments.

table_lines.name: >>Snout Position
table_lines.comment: Axial position of the snout (in mm) measured from isocenter to the downstream side of the snout (without consideration of variable length elements such as blocks, MLC and/or compensators). Required for first Item in Control Point Sequence, or if Snout Position changes during Beam.

C.8.8.26-1.table_caption: RT Ion Beams Session Record Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Referenced Fraction Group Number
table_lines.comment: Identifier of fraction group within referenced RT Ion Plan.

table_lines.name: Number of Fractions Planned
table_lines.comment: Total number of treatments (fractions) planned for current fraction group.

table_lines.name: Primary Dosimeter Unit
table_lines.comment: Measurement unit of the machine dosimeter.

table_lines.name: Treatment Session Ion Beam Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of setup and/or treatment beams administered during treatment session.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Beam Type
table_lines.comment: Motion characteristic of Beam.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Type
table_lines.comment: Particle type of Beam.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Mass Number
table_lines.comment: Mass number of radiation. Required if Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is ION.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Atomic Number
table_lines.comment: Atomic number of radiation. Required if Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is ION.

table_lines.name: >Radiation Charge State
table_lines.comment: Charge state of radiation. Required if Radiation Type (300A,00C6) is ION.

table_lines.name: >Scan Mode
table_lines.comment: The method of beam scanning used during treatment.

table_lines.name: >Modulated Scan Mode Type
table_lines.comment:
Defines the specialization of a modulated scan mode.
Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED_SPEC.
See

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag
table_lines.comment: Whether the RT Beam Limiting Devices are specified by the Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1).

table_lines.name: >Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) sets.
Shall not be present if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator).

table_lines.name: >>Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs
table_lines.comment: Number of leaf (element) or jaw pairs (equal to 1 for standard beam limiting device jaws).

table_lines.name: >Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Descriptions.
Required if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) is present and has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.usage:
Device Type Code Sequence (3010,002E) within

See

table_lines.name: >Referenced Verification Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of verification images obtained during delivery of current beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses measured during treatment delivery for current Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Measured Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Measured Dose Reference specified by Measured Dose Reference Number (3008,0064) in Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0010). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of doses estimated for each treatment delivery.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Calculated Dose Reference specified by Calculated Dose Reference Number (3008,0072) within Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0070). Required if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not present.

table_lines.name: >>Calculated Dose Reference Dose Value
table_lines.comment: Calculated Dose (Gy).

table_lines.name: >Number of Wedges
table_lines.comment: Number of wedges associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Wedge Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment wedges.
Required if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Wedges (300A,00D0).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Identification number of the Wedges. The value of Wedge Number (300A,00D2) shall be unique within the Beam in which it was created.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Type
table_lines.comment: Type of wedge (if any) defined for Beam.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for Wedge.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Angle
table_lines.comment: Nominal wedge angle (degrees).

table_lines.name: >>Wedge Orientation
table_lines.comment: Orientation of wedge, i.e., orientation of IEC WEDGE FILTER coordinate system with respect to the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate systems (degrees).

table_lines.name: >Number of Compensators
table_lines.comment: Number of range compensators associated with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Compensator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of treatment compensators.
Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Compensators (300A,00E0).

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Compensator Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies compensator specified by Compensator Number (300A,00E4) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Compensator ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for compensator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Boli
table_lines.comment: Number of boli associated with current Beam.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Bolus Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of boli associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Boli (300A,00ED) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Boli (300A,00ED).

table_lines.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
table_lines.comment: sect_C.8.8.5sect_C.8.8.9

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Blocks
table_lines.comment: Number of blocks recorded as being present during beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Block Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of blocks recorded as being present during beam delivery.
Required if Number of Blocks (300A,00F0) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Blocks (300A,00F0).

table_lines.name: >>Block Tray ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for block tray.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment:
Recorded machine-readable identifier for this Block during beam delivery.
Shall not be present if Recorded Block Slab Sequence (3008,00D1) is present.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Block Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies block specified by Block Number (300A,00FC) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Block Name
table_lines.comment: User-defined name for block.

table_lines.name: >>Number of Block Slab Items
table_lines.comment: Number of Block Slabs comprising the Block recorded as being present during beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >>Recorded Block Slab Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of slab(s) that comprise the block recorded as being present during beam delivery.
Required if Number of Block Slab Items (300A,0440) is present and has a value greater than zero.
The number of Items included in this Sequence shall equal the value of Number of Block Slab Items (300A,0440).

table_lines.name: >>>Block Slab Number
table_lines.comment:
Identification number of the Block Slab.
The value shall start at 1, and increase monotonically by 1.
The number indicates the order of the slabs with respect to the source, where number 1 corresponds to the slab nearest to the source.

table_lines.name: >>>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: Recorded machine-readable identifier for this Block Slab during beam delivery.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Snout Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Snouts associated with Beam.
Required if Snout Sequence (300A,030C) is included in the RT Ion Plan referenced within the Referenced RT Plan Sequence (300C,0002).
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Snout ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Snout.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >Applicator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Applicators associated with Beam.
Required if Applicator Sequence (300A,0107) is included in the RT Ion Plan referenced within the Referenced RT Plan Sequence (300C,0002).
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Type
table_lines.comment: Type of applicator.

table_lines.name: >>Applicator Description
table_lines.comment: User-defined description for Applicator.

table_lines.name: >General Accessory Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of General Accessories associated with this Beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Number
