table_lines.comment: Identification Number of the General Accessory. The value shall be unique within the Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Description
table_lines.comment: User supplied description of General Accessory.

table_lines.name: >>General Accessory Type
table_lines.comment: Specifies the type of accessory.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: Machine-readable identifier for this accessory.

table_lines.name: >Number of Range Shifters
table_lines.comment: Number of range shifters associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Range Shifter Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of range shifters recorded with Beam.
Required if Number of Range Shifters (300A,0312) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Range Shifters (300A,0312).

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Range Shifter Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies range shifter specified by Range Shifter Number (300A,0316) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Range Shifter ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Range Modulator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Lateral Spreading Devices
table_lines.comment: Number of lateral spreading devices associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Lateral Spreading Device Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of lateral spreading devices associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Lateral Spreading Devices (300A,0330) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Lateral Spreading Devices (300A,0330).

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Lateral Spreading Device Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies lateral spreading device specified by Lateral Spreading Device Number (300A,0334) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Lateral Spreading Device ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Lateral Spreading Device.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >Number of Range Modulators
table_lines.comment: Number of range modulators associated with current beam.

table_lines.name: >Recorded Range Modulator Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of range modulators associated with Beam.
Required if Number of Range Modulators (300A,0340) is non-zero.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Range Modulators (300A,0340).

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Range Modulator Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies range modulator specified by Range Modulator Number (300A,0344) within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator ID
table_lines.comment: User or machine supplied identifier for Range Modulator.

table_lines.name: >>Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: An accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator Type
table_lines.comment:
Type of Range Modulator.
Only one Item in the Recorded Range Modulator Sequence (3008,00F6) can have a Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) of WHL_MODWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Current Modulation ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied identifier for the beam current modulation pattern. Required if Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >Fixation Eye
table_lines.comment: The eye used for fixation.

table_lines.name: >Current Fraction Number
table_lines.comment: Fraction number for this beam administration.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
table_lines.comment: Delivery Type of treatment.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Termination Status
table_lines.comment: Conditions under which treatment was terminated.

table_lines.name: >RT Treatment Termination Reason Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Identifies the reason why the current treatment beam has terminated.
Expected if the Treatment Termination Status (3008,002A) is not NORMAL.
One or more items are permitted in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Machine-Specific Treatment Termination Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Machine-specific termination codes.
Expected if the RT Treatment Termination Reason Code is (110501, DCM, "Equipment failure").
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Treatment Termination Description
table_lines.comment:
A user-readable description for an abnormal termination.
See Note

table_lines.name: >Treatment Verification Status
table_lines.comment: Conditions under which treatment was verified by a verification system.

table_lines.name: >Specified Treatment Time
table_lines.comment: Treatment Time set (sec).

table_lines.name: >Delivered Treatment Time
table_lines.comment: Treatment Time actually delivered (sec).

table_lines.name: >Delivered Depth Dose Parameters Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Set of parameters describing the depth dose distribution.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Delivered Reference Dose Definition
table_lines.comment:
Definition of the 100% delivered reference dose level.
See

table_lines.name: >>Delivered Distal Depth
table_lines.comment:
Penetration depth in water (mm) of the delivered particle excluding any user-installed range modifying devices, measured at the Delivered Distal Depth Fraction (300A,0507).
See

table_lines.name: >>Delivered Distal Depth Fraction
table_lines.comment:
Fraction of the value of dose relative to the 100% level defined by Delivered Reference Dose Definition (300A,0511). This determines the Delivered Distal Depth (300A,0508).
A value of 1.0 refers to 100% of the reference dose level defined by the Delivered Reference Dose Definition (300A,0511).
See

table_lines.name: >>Delivered Nominal Range Modulated Region Depths
table_lines.comment:
The depths of the proximal and distal limits of the range modulated region in water.
Contains two values (in mm). The first value defines the depth of the proximal limit. The second value defines the depth of the distal limit.
Required if Delivered Reference Dose Definition (300A,0511) has the value CENTER.
See

table_lines.name: >>Delivered Nominal Range Modulation Fractions
table_lines.comment:
Delivered Fractions of the Delivered Reference Dose Definition (300A,0511) defining the proximal and distal limits at which the range-modulated region is defined.
Contains two values. The first value defines the modulation fraction value at the proximal limit and the second value defines the modulation fraction value at the distal limit.
A value of 1.0 refers to the 100% reference dose level as defined in Delivered Reference Dose Definition (300A,0511).
Required if Delivered Nominal Range Modulated Region Depths (300A,0510) is present.
See

table_lines.name: >Number of Control Points
table_lines.comment: Number of control points in Beam.

table_lines.name: >Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam control points for current ion treatment beam.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Control Points (300A,0110).
See

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Control Point Index
table_lines.comment: Uniquely identifies Control Point specified by Control Point Index (300A,0112) within the Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006).

table_lines.name: >>Treatment Control Point Date
table_lines.comment: Date when the delivery of radiation at this control point began. For the final control point this shall be the Date when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>Treatment Control Point Time
table_lines.comment: Time when the delivery of radiation at this control point began. For the final control point this shall be the Time when the previous control point ended.

table_lines.name: >>Specified Meterset
table_lines.comment: Desired machine setting for current control point in units specified by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3).

table_lines.name: >>Delivered Meterset
table_lines.comment: Machine setting actually delivered at current control point in units specified by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3).

table_lines.name: >>Meterset Rate Set
table_lines.comment: The specified speed of delivery of the specified dose in units specified by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3) per minute.

table_lines.name: >>Meterset Rate Delivered
table_lines.comment: The delivered speed of delivery of the specified dose in units specified by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3) per minute.

table_lines.name: >>Nominal Beam Energy
table_lines.comment: Nominal Beam Energy at control point in MeV per nucleon. Defined at nozzle entrance before all Beam Modifiers. Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) changes during beam administration, and KVP (0018,0060) is not present.

table_lines.name: >>KVP
table_lines.comment: Peak kilo voltage output of the setup X-Ray generator used. Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041), or if kVp changes during setup, and Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) is not present.

table_lines.name: >>Ion Wedge Position Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Wedge positions for current control point.
Required for first Item of Ion Control Point Sequence if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero, and in subsequent control points if Wedge Position (300A,0118) or Wedge Thin Edge Position (300A,00DB) changes during beam.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall be identical to the value of Number of Wedges (300A,00D0).

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Wedge Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Wedge described by Wedge Number (300A,00D2) in Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1).

table_lines.name: >>>Wedge Position
table_lines.comment: Position of Wedge at current control point.

table_lines.name: >>Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Opening Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions.
Required for the first Control Point of Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0040), or if the values of the Beam Limiting Device change during the Beam and if Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Definition Flag (3008,00A3) has the value YES.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
The number of Items shall equal the number of Items in Enhanced RT Beam Limiting Device Sequence (3008,00A1) in the first Control Point and be equal or less in subsequent Control Points.
See

table_lines.name: >>Range Shifter Settings Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Range Shifter settings for the current control point.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Range Shifter Setting (300A,0362) changes during beam administration, and Number of Range Shifters (300A,0312) is non-zero.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Range Shifter Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Range Shifter described by Range Shifter Number (300A,0316) in Range Shifter Sequence (300A,0314).

table_lines.name: >>Lateral Spreading Device Settings Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Lateral Spreading Device settings for the current control point.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Lateral Spreading Device Setting (300A,0372) changes during beam administration, and Number of Lateral Spreading Devices (300A,0330) is non-zero.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Lateral Spreading Device Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Lateral Spreading Device described by Lateral Spreading Device Number (300A,0334) in Lateral Spreading Device Sequence (300A,0332).

table_lines.name: >>Range Modulator Settings Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Range Modulator Settings for current control point.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041), or if Range Modulator Settings change during beam administration, and Number of Range Modulators (300A,0340) is non-zero.

table_lines.name: >>>Referenced Range Modulator Number
table_lines.comment: Uniquely references Range Modulator described by Range Modulator Number (300A,0344) in Range Modulator Sequence (300A,0342).

table_lines.name: >>>Range Modulator Gating Start Value
table_lines.comment: Start position defines the range modulator position at which the beam is switched on. Required if Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) of the range modulator referenced by Referenced Range Modulator Number (300C,0104) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS or WHL_FIXEDWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >>>Range Modulator Gating Stop Value
table_lines.comment: Stop position defines the range modulator position at which the beam is switched off. Required if Range Modulator Type (300A,0348) of the range modulator referenced by Referenced Range Modulator Number (300C,0104) is WHL_MODWEIGHTS or WHL_FIXEDWEIGHTS.

table_lines.name: >>Gantry Angle
table_lines.comment: Treatment machine gantry angle, i.e., orientation of IEC GANTRY coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Gantry Angle changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Gantry Rotation Direction
table_lines.comment: Direction of Gantry Rotation when viewing gantry from isocenter, for segment beginning at current Control Point. Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041), or if Gantry Rotation Direction changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Angle
table_lines.comment: Beam Limiting Device (collimator) angle, i.e., orientation of IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC GANTRY coordinate system (degrees). Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if beam limiting device (collimator) angle changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Rotation Direction
table_lines.comment: Direction of Beam Limiting Device Rotation when viewing beam limiting device (collimator) from radiation source, for segment beginning at current Control Point. Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Beam Limiting Device Rotation Direction changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Scan Spot Tune ID
table_lines.comment: User-supplied or machine code identifier for machine configuration to produce beam spot. This may be the nominal spot size or some other machine specific value. Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED or MODULATED_SPEC.

table_lines.name: >>Number of Scan Spot Positions
table_lines.comment: Number of spot positions used to specify scanning pattern for current segment beginning at control point. Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED or MODULATED_SPEC.

table_lines.name: >>Scan Spot Time Offset
table_lines.comment:
A set of time offsets (in microseconds). Each offset is the time from the Treatment Control Point Time (3008,0025) until both the beam has reached the X,Y position recorded in the Scan Spot Position Map (300A,0394) and ion delivery has started at this position.
The order of values matches the order of positions in Scan Spot Position Map (300A,0394).
The number of values shall equal the value of Number of Scan Spot Positions (300A,0392).

table_lines.name: >>Scan Spot Sizes Delivered
table_lines.comment:
A data stream of (x,y) pairs that define the delivered spot sizes using the Full Width Half Maximum (FWHM) as measured by the delivery monitoring system. Specified by a numeric pair where the sizes are projected in air to the isocenter in IEC GANTRY X direction followed by the size in the IEC GANTRY Y direction (mm).
The order of values shall match the order of positions in the Scan Spot Position Map (300A,0394) and contain 2N values where N is the Number of Scan Spot Positions (300A,0392).

table_lines.name: >>Number of Paintings
table_lines.comment:
The intended number of times the scan pattern given by Scan Spot Position Map (300A,0394) and Scan Spot Meterset Weights (300A,0396) in the Referenced RT Plan was to be applied at the current control point.
Required if Scan Mode (300A,0308) is MODULATED or MODULATED_SPEC.

table_lines.name: >>Scan Spot Reordered
table_lines.comment:
Indicates that the spots were delivered in a different order than in the plan.
When absent it is not known if the treatment delivery device delivered or reported in the order as planned. See Note

table_lines.name: >>Scan Spot Prescribed Indices
table_lines.comment:
The indices of the prescribed spots corresponding to each delivered spot. These indices are the ordinal positions of the spots in the Scan Spot Meterset Weights (300A,0396) in the Ion Control Point Sequence (300A,03A8) of the referenced RT Ion Plan. The numbering of indices of the prescribed spots shall start at one (a value of one refers the first ordinal position).
Required, if Scan Spot Reordered (300A,0393) equals YES.
Contains N values where N is the Number of Scan Spot Positions (300A,0392).

table_lines.name: >>Patient Support Angle
table_lines.comment: Patient Support angle, i.e., orientation of IEC PATIENT SUPPORT (turntable) coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Patient Support Angle changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Patient Support Rotation Direction
table_lines.comment:
Direction of Patient Support Rotation when viewing table from above, for segment beginning at current Control Point.
Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041), or if Patient Support Rotation Direction changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Chair Head Frame Position
table_lines.comment:
A device-specific value that specifies the relationship between the chair in which the patient is sitting and the head frame in which their head is fixed.
It shall be expressed as a distance in mm, such that positive is towards the patient's head away from the seat.
Typically used for eye treatments.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Vertical Position
table_lines.comment: Table Top Vertical position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). This value is interpreted as an absolute, rather than relative, Table setting. Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Table Top Vertical Position changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Longitudinal Position
table_lines.comment: Table Top Longitudinal position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). This value is interpreted as an absolute, rather than relative, Table setting. Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Table Top Longitudinal Position changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Table Top Lateral Position
table_lines.comment: Table Top Lateral position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). This value is interpreted as an absolute, rather than relative, Table setting. Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Table Top Lateral Position changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Snout Position
table_lines.comment: Axial position of the snout (in mm) measured from isocenter to the downstream side of the snout (without consideration of variable length elements such as blocks, MLC and/or compensators). Required for Control Point 0 of Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041) or if Snout Position changes during beam administration.

table_lines.name: >>Corrected Parameter Sequence
table_lines.comment:
A Sequence of Items describing corrections made to any Attributes prior to delivery of the next control point.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Sequence Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the parent Sequence containing the Attribute that was corrected. The value is limited in scope to the Treatment Session Ion Beam Sequence (3008,0021) and all nested Sequences therein.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Item Index
table_lines.comment: Contains the Sequence Item index (monotonically increasing from 1) of the corrected Attribute within its parent Sequence as indicated by Parameter Sequence Pointer (3008,0061).

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the Attribute that was corrected.

table_lines.name: >>>Correction Value
table_lines.comment: The value that was added the value referenced by the Parameter Sequence Pointer (3008,0061), Parameter Item Index (3008,0063) and Parameter Pointer (3008,0065).

table_lines.name: >>Override Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of parameters that were overridden during the administration of the beam segment immediately prior to the current control point.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Sequence Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the parent Sequence containing the Attribute that was overriden. The value is limited in scope to the Treatment Session Ion Beam Sequence (3008,0021) and all nested Sequences therein.

table_lines.name: >>>Override Parameter Pointer
table_lines.comment: Contains the Data Element Tag of the Attribute that was overridden.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Item Index
table_lines.comment: Contains the Sequence Item index (monotonically increasing from 1) of the overriden Attributes within it's parent Sequence. The value is limited in scope to the Treatment Session Ion Beam Sequence (3008,0021) and all nested Sequences therein.

table_lines.name: >>>Parameter Value Number
table_lines.comment: Positive integer identifying which value of a multi-valued Attribute identified by Override Parameter Pointer (3008,0062) is referenced. The value 1 identifies the first value.

table_lines.name: >>>Operators' Name
table_lines.comment: Name of operator who authorized override.

table_lines.name: >>>Operator Identification Sequence
table_lines.comment: Identification of the operator who authorized override. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>>Override Reason
table_lines.comment: User-defined description of reason for override of parameter specified by Override Parameter Pointer (3008,0062).

table_lines.name: >Interlock Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Interlocks that occurred prior, during or after the delivery of radiation of this beam.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

C.8.8.27-1.table_caption: Beam Limiting Device Position Macro Attributes

table_lines.name: Beam Limiting Device Position Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions.
Required if Ion Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,03A4) or Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence (3008,00A0) is included in this SOP Instance
                                        and for first Item of the including control point Sequence (either Ion Control Point Sequence (300A,03A8) or Ion Control Point Delivery Sequence (3008,0041)),
                                        or if any value of Leaf/Jaw Positions (300A,011C) changes during the Beam.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
In the first Control Point the number of Items shall be equal to the number of Items of corresponding device definition sequence (Ion Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,03A4) or Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence (3008,00A0)).
In subsequent Control Points the Items present shall be only those whose values change during the Beam.

table_lines.name: >RT Beam Limiting Device Type
table_lines.comment: Type of beam limiting device (collimator). The value of this Attribute shall correspond to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8) defined in an Item of Ion Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,03A4).

table_lines.name: Patient Support ID
table_lines.comment: User-specified identifier for manufacturer specific patient support devices.

table_lines.name: Patient Support Accessory Code
table_lines.comment: A Patient Support accessory identifier to be read by a device such as a bar code reader.

C.8.8.29-1.table_caption: RT Beams Delivery Instruction Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Referenced RT Plan Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Reference to a single RT Plan or RT Ion Plan SOP Instance (whose UID is also supplied in the Input Information Sequence - see
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: Beam Task Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Specification of beams to be delivered and/or used for verification of the patient position.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Beam Task Type
table_lines.comment: Whether the beam is used to verify patient position, deliver treatment, or both.

table_lines.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
table_lines.comment: Delivery Type of treatment.

table_lines.name: >Primary Dosimeter Unit
table_lines.comment:
Measurement unit of machine dosimeter.
This value shall be the same as in the referenced RT Plan. It applies only to the Continuation Start Meterset (0074,0120) and Continuation End Meterset (0074,0121).
Required if Treatment Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION.

table_lines.name: >Continuation Start Meterset
table_lines.comment:
Meterset within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006) at which treatment delivery starts, in units specified by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3).
Required if Treatment Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION.

table_lines.name: >Continuation End Meterset
table_lines.comment:
Meterset within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number (300C,0006) at which treatment delivery ends, in units specified by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3).
Required if Treatment Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Fraction Group Number
table_lines.comment:
Indicates which fraction group of the referenced plan is to be treated in the treatment session. Only one Fraction Group shall be specified per Delivery Instruction SOP Instance.
Required if the referenced plan has more than one Fraction Group Sequence (300A,0070) Item.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Vertical Setup Displacement
table_lines.comment: Vertical Displacement in the IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system in mm relative to initial Setup Position, i.e., vertical offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Longitudinal Setup Displacement
table_lines.comment: Longitudinal Displacement in the IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system in mm relative to initial Setup Position, i.e., longitudinal offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

table_lines.name: >Table Top Lateral Setup Displacement
table_lines.comment: Lateral Displacement in the IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system in mm relative to initial Setup Position, i.e., lateral offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

table_lines.name: >Delivery Verification Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Patient position verification images to be acquired for current beam.
Required if Beam Task Type (0074,1022) is VERIFY or VERIFY_AND_TREAT.
Zero or one Item shall be included in this Sequence if Beam Task Type (0074,1022) is VERIFY. Zero or more Items shall be included in this Sequence if Beam Task Type (0074,1022) is VERIFY_AND_TREAT.

table_lines.name: >>Verification Image Timing
table_lines.comment: Indicates the temporal relationship of the verification image with respect to the current treatment beam delivery. Value shall be DURING_BEAM for Beams with a Beam Task Type (0074,1022) of VERIFY.

table_lines.name: >>Start Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition will start. Required if Verification Image Timing (0074,1032) is DURING_BEAM.

table_lines.name: >>Meterset Exposure
table_lines.comment:
Treatment machine Meterset duration over which image is to be acquired, specified in Monitor units (MU) or minutes as defined by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3) specified in the Referenced RT Plan Sequence (300C,0002).
Required if Verification Image Timing (0074,1032) is BEFORE_BEAM or AFTER_BEAM.
See

table_lines.name: >>End Cumulative Meterset Weight
table_lines.comment:
Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition will end.
Required if Verification Image Timing (0074,1032) is DURING_BEAM.

table_lines.name: >>Double Exposure Flag
table_lines.comment: Indicates whether the current verification image is a single or double exposure.

table_lines.name: >>Double Exposure Ordering
table_lines.comment:
Indicates the ordering of the open (double exposure) field with respect to the primary (collimated) field in a double exposure.
Required if Double Exposure Flag (0074,1034) is DOUBLE.

table_lines.name: >>Double Exposure Meterset
table_lines.comment:
If this field is present, an additional exposure with the indicated Meterset is requested.
Required if Double Exposure Flag (0074,1034) is DOUBLE.

table_lines.name: >>Double Exposure Field Delta
table_lines.comment:
Offsets of field-defining edges in mm for the double exposure in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system in the IEC order X1, X2, Y1, Y2. Negative values for X1 and Y1 indicate an enlarged field, negative values for X2 and Y2 indicate a reduced field.
Required if Double Exposure Flag (0074,1034) is DOUBLE.
See

table_lines.name: >>X-Ray Image Receptor Translation
table_lines.comment: Position in (x,y,z) coordinates in mm of origin of the IEC X-RAY IMAGE RECEPTOR System in the IEC GANTRY coordinate system.

table_lines.name: >>Related Reference RT Image Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Uniquely identifies Reference Images to which planned verification image is related. All Items in this Sequence shall be RT Image SOP Instances.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: Omitted Beam Task Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Beams not to be delivered and/or used for patient position verification.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Reason for Omission
table_lines.comment: Reason why the referenced beam is not to be delivered and/or verified:

table_lines.name: >Reason for Omission Description
table_lines.comment: Description of reason for omission.

C.8.8.30-1.table_caption: RT Brachy Application Setup Delivery Instruction Module Attributes

table_lines.name: Referenced RT Plan Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Reference to a single RT Plan SOP Instance containing all the brachy application setups and the fraction group referenced in this SOP Instance.
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: Referenced Fraction Group Number
table_lines.comment: Indicates which fraction group of the referenced RT Plan in the Referenced RT Plan Sequence (300C,0002) is to be treated in the treatment session.

table_lines.name: Current Fraction Number
table_lines.comment:
The index of the fraction that is to be delivered or completed in this treatment session.
See

table_lines.name: Continuation Pulse Number
table_lines.comment:
The index of the pulse that is to be delivered or completed in this treatment session.
Required if Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) of the referenced RT Plan in the Referenced RT Plan Sequence (300C,0002) is PDR and if Treatment Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION in any of the Items in the Brachy Task Sequence (0074,1401).
See

table_lines.name: Brachy Task Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Specification of Brachy Application Setups to be delivered.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
table_lines.comment:
Delivery Type of treatment.
See

table_lines.name: >Continuation Start Total Reference Air Kerma
table_lines.comment:
Total Reference Air Kerma within the Application Setup referenced by Referenced Brachy Application Setup Number (300C,000C) at which treatment delivery starts.
Required if Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION.

table_lines.name: >Continuation End Total Reference Air Kerma
table_lines.comment:
Total Reference Air Kerma within the Application Setup referenced by Referenced Brachy Application Setup Number (300C,000C) at which treatment delivery ends.
Required if Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Brachy Application Setup Number
table_lines.comment:
Brachy Application Setup Number (300A,0234) within Brachy Application Setup Sequence (300A,0230) in the referenced RT Plan.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Channel Delivery Order Sequence
table_lines.comment:
The order in which the channels are to be delivered.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Channel Number
table_lines.comment: The channel to be delivered, specified by the value of Channel Number (300A,0282) in referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: >>Channel Delivery Order Index
table_lines.comment: The order of delivery of this channel, monotonically increasing by 1, starting from 1, where number 1 is the first channel to be delivered.

table_lines.name: >Channel Delivery Continuation Sequence
table_lines.comment:
The treatment time weights for channels to be delivered to complete a previously interrupted fraction.
Required if Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Channel Number
table_lines.comment: The channel to be delivered, specified by the value of Channel Number (300A,0282) in referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: >>Start Cumulative Time Weight
table_lines.comment:
Cumulative Time Weight where to start/continue the delivery of the referenced channel.
See

table_lines.name: >>End Cumulative Time Weight
table_lines.comment:
Cumulative Time Weight where to stop the delivery of the referenced channel.
See

table_lines.name: Omitted Application Setup Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Application Setups of the current RT Plan containing channels not to be delivered.
Required if Delivery Type (300A,00CE) is CONTINUATION and one or more channels of any Application Setup are omitted.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Referenced Brachy Application Setup Number
table_lines.comment: Brachy Application Setup Number (300A,0234) within Brachy Application Setup Sequence (300A,0230) in referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: >Omitted Channel Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Channels defined for this Application Setup not to be delivered.
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >>Referenced Channel Number
table_lines.comment: Channel to be omitted, specified by the value of Channel Number (300A,0282) in the referenced RT Plan.

table_lines.name: >>Reason for Channel Omission
table_lines.comment: Reason why the referenced channel is not to be delivered.

table_lines.name: >>Reason for Channel Omission Description
table_lines.comment: Description of reason for omission.

table_lines.name: SUV Type
table_lines.comment:
Type of Standardized Uptake Value (SUV).
If absent, and the Units (0054,1001) are GML, then the type of SUV shall be assumed to be BW.

table_lines.name: Counts Source
table_lines.comment: The primary source of counts. The primary source leads to the underlying image Units (0054,1001), as opposed to secondary sources that are used during reconstruction correction.

table_lines.name: Reprojection Method
table_lines.comment: Method for projecting volumetric data onto planar projection. Required if Series Type (0054,1000), Value 2 is REPROJECTION.

table_lines.name: Number of R-R Intervals
table_lines.comment: The maximum number of R-R Intervals that may exist in this Series. Required if Series Type (0054,1000), Value 1 is GATED.

table_lines.name: Number of Time Slots
table_lines.comment: The maximum number of Time Slots that may exist in this Series. Required if Series Type (0054,1000), Value 1 is GATED.

table_lines.name: Number of Time Slices
table_lines.comment: The maximum number of Time Slices that may exist in this Series. Required if Series Type (0054,1000), Value 1 is DYNAMIC.

table_lines.name: Number of Slices
table_lines.comment: The maximum number of Slices that may exist in this Series.

table_lines.name: Corrected Image
table_lines.comment: One or more values that indicate which, if any, corrections have been applied to the images in this Series.

table_lines.name: Randoms Correction Method
table_lines.comment: Type of randoms correction processing.

table_lines.name: Attenuation Correction Method
table_lines.comment: A textual description of the attenuation correction processing. e.g., measured vs. calculated, transmission source type (ring, line, point), assumed patient geometry (polygon, ellipse, segmented, attenuation coefficient, skull thickness), post-injection transmission, smoothing.

table_lines.name: Scatter Correction Method
table_lines.comment: A textual description of the scatter correction processing. e.g., convolution-subtraction, dual energy window, model-based, use of attenuation data.

table_lines.name: Reconstruction Diameter
table_lines.comment:
Diameter, in mm, of the region within which the data was used in creating the reconstruction of the image. Data may exist outside this region and portions of the patient may exist outside this region.
The diameter defines a circular region that is entirely contained within the encoded Pixel Data (7FE0,0010), unless the encoded image has been cropped after reconstruction.

table_lines.name: Convolution Kernel
table_lines.comment: Textual description of the convolution kernel(s) used to reconstruct the data (e.g., name, cutoff, radial/axial/angular, mathematical form, DC handling).

table_lines.name: Reconstruction Method
table_lines.comment: Textual description of reconstruction processing, e.g., 2D filtered backprojection, 2D iterative, 3D PROMIS, 3D FAVOR, 3D iterative.

table_lines.name: Detector Lines of Response Used
table_lines.comment: Textual description of which detector lines of response were used, mashed, or otherwise processed during tomographic reconstruction.

table_lines.name: Acquisition Start Condition
table_lines.comment:
Description of how the data collection was started.
See

table_lines.name: Acquisition Start Condition Data
table_lines.comment: Count density, change in count density, or physiological triggers causing data collection to start.

table_lines.name: Acquisition Termination Condition
table_lines.comment:
Description of how the data collection for the Series was stopped.
See

table_lines.name: Acquisition Termination Condition Data
table_lines.comment: Number of counts, count density, change in count density, or physiological triggers causing the termination.

table_lines.name: Field of View Shape
table_lines.comment: Shape of the field of view of the PET camera.

table_lines.name: Field of View Dimensions
table_lines.comment: Dimensions of the field of view, in mm. Transverse detector diameter followed by axial width.

table_lines.name: Gantry/Detector Slew
table_lines.comment: Angle of slew in degrees of the gantry. Positive slew is moving the gantry on the patient's left toward the patient's superior, when the patient is supine.

table_lines.name: Type of Detector Motion
table_lines.comment: Describes the detector motion during acquisition.

table_lines.name: Collimator Type
table_lines.comment: Collimator Type.

table_lines.name: Collimator/Grid Name
table_lines.comment: Label describing the collimator used.

table_lines.name: Axial Acceptance
table_lines.comment: Maximum axial angle accepted, in degrees.

table_lines.name: Detector Element Size
table_lines.comment: Size of an individual detector element, in mm. Transverse dimension followed by axial dimension. For a discrete crystal, this is the crystal size. For a continuous detector, this is the pixel bin size.

table_lines.name: Coincidence Window Width
table_lines.comment: The width of the coincidence timing window, in nsec. The maximum time difference accepted between two single events.

table_lines.name: Energy Window Range Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Items that describes the energy windows used for this Series.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >Energy Window Lower Limit
table_lines.comment: The lower limit of the energy window, in KeV.

table_lines.name: >Energy Window Upper Limit
table_lines.comment: The upper limit of the energy window, in KeV.

table_lines.name: Secondary Counts Type
table_lines.comment: Array defining the type of additional counts accumulated during acquisition.

table_lines.name: Scan Progression Direction
table_lines.comment: The anatomical order in which the slices were acquired.

table_lines.name: Radiopharmaceutical Information Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Items that describe isotope information.
Zero or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Radionuclide Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence that identifies the radionuclide.
Zero or one Item shall be included in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Route
table_lines.comment: Route of administration.

table_lines.name: >Administration Route Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence that identifies the administration route of the radiopharmaceutical.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Volume
table_lines.comment: Volume of administered radiopharmaceutical in cubic cm.

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Start Time
table_lines.comment:
Time of start of administration. The actual time of radiopharmaceutical administration to the patient for imaging purposes, using the same time base as Series Time (0008,0031).
The use of this Attribute is deprecated in favor of Radiopharmaceutical Start DateTime (0018,1078).

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Start DateTime
table_lines.comment: Date and time of start of administration. The actual date and time of radiopharmaceutical administration to the patient for imaging purposes, using the same time base as Series Time (0008,0031).

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Stop Time
table_lines.comment:
Time of end of administration. The actual ending time of radiopharmaceutical administration to the patient for imaging purposes, using the same time base as Series Time (0008,0031).
The use of this Attribute is deprecated in favor of Radiopharmaceutical Stop DateTime (0018,1079).

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Stop DateTime
table_lines.comment: Date and time of end of administration. The actual ending date and time of radiopharmaceutical administration to the patient for imaging purposes, using the same time base as Series Time (0008,0031).

table_lines.name: >Radionuclide Total Dose
table_lines.comment: The radiopharmaceutical dose administered to the patient measured in Becquerels (Bq) at the Radiopharmaceutical Start Time (0018,1072).

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Administration Event UID
table_lines.comment: Unique identification of the administration of the radiopharmaceutical to the patient.

table_lines.name: >Radionuclide Half Life
table_lines.comment: The radionuclide half life, in seconds, that was used in the correction of this image.

table_lines.name: >Radionuclide Positron Fraction
table_lines.comment: The radionuclide positron fraction (fraction of decays that are by positron emission) that was used in the correction of this image.

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Specific Activity
table_lines.comment: The activity per unit mass of the radiopharmaceutical, in Bq/micromole, at the Radiopharmaceutical Start Time (0018,1072).

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical
table_lines.comment: Name of the radiopharmaceutical.

table_lines.name: >Radiopharmaceutical Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence that identifies the radiopharmaceutical.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: Intervention Drug Information Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence of Items that describes the intervention drugs used.
One or more Items are permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Intervention Drug Name
table_lines.comment: Name of the intervention drug.

table_lines.name: >Intervention Drug Code Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Sequence that identifies the intervention drug name.
Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: >Intervention Drug Start Time
table_lines.comment: Time of administration of the intervention drug, using the same time base as for Series Time (0008,0031).

table_lines.name: >Intervention Drug Stop Time
table_lines.comment: Time of completion of administration of the intervention drug, using the same time base as for Series Time (0008,0031).

table_lines.name: >Intervention Drug Dose
table_lines.comment: Intervention drug dose, in mg.

table_lines.name: Beat Rejection Flag
table_lines.comment: Heart beat duration sorting has been applied.

table_lines.name: Trigger Source or Type
table_lines.comment: Text indicating trigger source.

table_lines.name: PVC Rejection
table_lines.comment: Description of the type of PVC rejection criteria used.

table_lines.name: Skip Beats
table_lines.comment: Number of beats skipped after a detected arrhythmia.

table_lines.name: Heart Rate
table_lines.comment: Average number of heart beats per minute for the collection period for this image. This shall include all accepted beats as well as rejected beats.

table_lines.name: Samples per Pixel
table_lines.comment: Number of samples (planes) in this image.

table_lines.name: Bits Allocated
table_lines.comment: Number of bits allocated for each pixel sample. Each sample shall have the same number of bits allocated.

table_lines.name: Bits Stored
table_lines.comment: Number of bits stored for each pixel sample. Each sample shall have the same number of bits stored. The value shall be the same as the value in Bits Allocated (0028,0100).

table_lines.name: High Bit
table_lines.comment: Most significant bit for pixel sample data. Each sample shall have the same high bit. Shall be one less than the value in Bits Stored (0028,0101).

table_lines.name: Rescale Intercept
table_lines.comment: The value b in relationship between stored values (SV) and pixel value units (U) defined in Units (0054,1001): U = m*SV+b. The Rescale Intercept is always zero for PET images.

table_lines.name: Rescale Slope
table_lines.comment: m in the equation specified in Rescale Intercept (0028,1052).

table_lines.name: Trigger Time
table_lines.comment: Time interval, in msec, from the start of the trigger to the beginning of data acquisition for this image. Required if Series Type (0054,1000), Value 1 is GATED.

table_lines.name: Low R-R Value
table_lines.comment: R-R interval lower limit for beat rejection, in msec. Required if Series Type (0054,1000), Value 1 is GATED and Beat Rejection Flag (0018,1080) is Y.

table_lines.name: High R-R Value
table_lines.comment: R-R interval upper limit for beat rejection, in msec. Required if Series Type (0054,1000), Value 1 is GATED and Beat Rejection Flag (0018,1080) is Y.

table_lines.name: Lossy Image Compression
table_lines.comment:
Specifies whether an Image has undergone lossy compression (at a point in its lifetime).
Once this value has been set to "01" it shall not be reset.
See
Required if Lossy Compression has been performed on the image. May be present otherwise.

table_lines.name: Nominal Interval
table_lines.comment: Average duration of accepted beats, in msec, of the R-R interval.

table_lines.name: Intervals Acquired
table_lines.comment: Number of heartbeats that fall within Low R-R Value (0018,1081) and High R-R Value (0018,1082), and were therefore accepted and contribute coincidence events to this R-R Interval.

table_lines.name: Intervals Rejected
table_lines.comment: Number of heartbeats that fall outside Low R-R Value (0018,1081) and High R-R Value (0018,1082), and do not contribute coincidence events to this R-R Interval. However, they may contribute coincidence events to other R-R Intervals.

table_lines.name: Primary (Prompts) Counts Accumulated
table_lines.comment: The sum of events that occur in the primary event channel. The counts include Trues +Scatter+ Randoms if Randoms Correction Method (0054,1100) is NONE; otherwise the counts are Trues +Scatter.

table_lines.name: Slice Sensitivity Factor
table_lines.comment: The slice-to-slice sensitivity correction factor that was used to correct this image. The value shall be one if no slice sensitivity correction was applied.

table_lines.name: Decay Factor
table_lines.comment: The decay factor that was used to scale this image. Required if Decay Correction (0054,1102) is other than NONE. If decay correction is applied, all images in the Series shall be decay corrected to the same time.

table_lines.name: Scatter Fraction Factor
table_lines.comment: An estimate of the fraction of acquired counts that were due to scatter and were corrected in this image. The value shall be zero if no scatter correction was applied.

table_lines.name: Dead Time Factor
table_lines.comment: The average dead time correction factor that was applied to this image. The value shall be one if no dead time correction was applied.

table_lines.usage: No CID for the Anatomic Region Sequence is defined.

table_lines.name: Isocenter Position
table_lines.comment: Isocenter coordinates (x,y,z), in mm. Specifies the location of the machine isocenter in the Patient-Based Coordinate System associated with the Frame of Reference. It allows transformation from the Equipment-Based Coordinate System to the Patient-Based Coordinate System.

table_lines.name: Modality
table_lines.comment:
Type of device, process or method that originally acquired the data used to create the images in this Series.
See

table_lines.name: Referenced Performed Procedure Step Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Uniquely identifies the Performed Procedure Step SOP Instance to which the Series is related.
Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.
Required if a Performed Procedure Step SOP Class was involved in the creation of this Series.

table_lines.name: Presentation Intent Type
table_lines.comment:
Identifies the intent of the images that are contained within this Series.
See

table_lines.name: Image Laterality
table_lines.comment:
Laterality of (possibly paired) body part (as described in Anatomic Region Sequence (0008,2218)) examined.
Shall be consistent with any laterality information contained in Primary Anatomic Structure Modifier Sequence (0008,2230), if present.

table_lines.name: Image Type
table_lines.comment:
Image identification characteristics.
See

table_lines.name: Samples per Pixel
table_lines.comment: Number of samples in this image.

table_lines.name: Photometric Interpretation
table_lines.comment: Specifies the intended interpretation of the pixel data.

table_lines.name: Bits Allocated
table_lines.comment: Number of bits allocated for each pixel sample.

table_lines.name: Bits Stored
table_lines.comment: Number of bits stored for each pixel sample.

table_lines.name: High Bit
table_lines.comment:
Most significant bit for pixel sample data.
Shall be one less than the value in Bit Stored (0028,0101).

table_lines.name: Pixel Representation
table_lines.comment: Data representation of the pixel samples.

table_lines.name: Pixel Intensity Relationship
table_lines.comment:
The relationship between the Pixel sample values and the X-Ray beam intensity.
See

table_lines.name: Pixel Intensity Relationship Sign
table_lines.comment:
The sign of the relationship between the Pixel sample values stored in Pixel Data (7FE0,0010) and the X-Ray beam intensity.
See

table_lines.name: Rescale Intercept
table_lines.comment:
The value b in the relationship between stored values (SV) in Pixel Data (7FE0,0010) and the output units specified in Rescale Type (0028,1054).
Output units = m*SV + b.
See

table_lines.name: Rescale Slope
table_lines.comment:
m in the equation specified by Rescale Intercept (0028,1052).
See

table_lines.name: Rescale Type
table_lines.comment:
Specifies the output units of Rescale Slope (0028,1053) and Rescale Intercept (0028,1052).
See

table_lines.name: Presentation LUT Shape
table_lines.comment:
Specifies an identity transformation for the Presentation LUT, other than to account for the value of Photometric Interpretation (0028,0004), such that the output of all grayscale transformations defined in the IOD containing this Module are defined to be P-Values.
See

table_lines.name: Lossy Image Compression
table_lines.comment:
Specifies whether an Image has undergone lossy compression (at a point in its lifetime).
Once this value has been set to "01" it shall not be reset.
See

table_lines.name: Lossy Image Compression Ratio
table_lines.comment:
Describes the approximate lossy compression ratio(s) that have been applied to this image.
See
Required if Lossy Image Compression (0028,2110) is "01".

table_lines.name: Derivation Description
table_lines.comment:
A text description of how this image was derived.
See

table_lines.name: Acquisition Device Processing Description
table_lines.comment:
Indicates any visual processing performed on the images prior to exchange.
See

table_lines.name: Acquisition Device Processing Code
table_lines.comment: Code representing the device-specific processing associated with the image (e.g., Organ Filtering code)

table_lines.name: Patient Orientation
table_lines.comment:
Patient direction of the rows and columns of the image.
See
Required if View Code Sequence (0054,0220) is not present or is present with an Item value other than

table_lines.name: Calibration Image
table_lines.comment:
Indicates whether a reference object (phantom) of known size is present in the image and was used for calibration.
Device is identified using the

table_lines.name: Burned In Annotation
table_lines.comment: Indicates whether or not image contains sufficient burned in annotation to identify the patient and date the image was acquired.

table_lines.name: VOI LUT Sequence
table_lines.comment:
Defines a Sequence of VOI LUTs.
See
One or more Items shall be included in this Sequence.
Required if Presentation Intent Type (0008,0068) is FOR PRESENTATION and Window Center (0028,1050) is not present. May also be present if Window Center (0028,1050) is present.

table_lines.name: >LUT Descriptor
table_lines.comment:
Specifies the format of the LUT Data in this Sequence.
See

table_lines.name: >LUT Explanation
table_lines.comment: Free form text explanation of the meaning of the LUT.

table_lines.name: >LUT Data
table_lines.comment: LUT Data in this Sequence.

table_lines.name: Window Center
table_lines.comment:
Defines a Window Center for display.
See
Required if Presentation Intent Type (0008,0068) is FOR PRESENTATION and VOI LUT Sequence (0028,3010) is not present. May also be present if VOI LUT Sequence (0028,3010) is present.

table_lines.name: Window Width
table_lines.comment: Required if Window Center (0028,1050) is present.

table_lines.name: Window Center & Width Explanation
table_lines.comment: Free form explanation of the meaning of the Window Center and Width. Multiple values correspond to multiple Window Center and Width values.
